title: Office 365 Specialist to Sweco IT
description:
The Office 365 Management Team at Sweco IT is seeking a passionate Office 365 Specialist with a strong interest in Identity and Access Management solutions. This role offers a dynamic work environment where you will contribute to innovative projects, implement new solutions, and provide expert advice in strategic planning.
   

  

 You will belong to the Infrastructure & Cloud unit at Sweco IT and report to the Team Manager for Office 365 Management. Our team consists of specialists in Identity, Collaboration, and Email/Messaging, spread across five European countries. With the rapid adoption of O365 at Sweco, there are abundant opportunities to drive change and pioneer new technologies.
   

  

**Role Responsibilities**
 In the role of Office 365 Specialist you will work in our Office 365 Management team based in our Stockholm Office. In your daily work you will research and implement new solutions, be involved with ongoing projects, handle requests for new services, and be an advisor in strategic planning whilst working closely with the wider Sweco business.
   

  

 You will work proactively with developing and improving processes, solving problems, and developing documentation. You will be a ‘go to’ person for technical advice and information both within Sweco IT and in the business.
   

  

**Key Qualifications**
* A minimum of 3 years’ relevant experience and solid understanding of technical concepts.
* Solid technical background with strong knowledge of Office 365 services and technologies, including Entra ID.
* Experience in O365 migration work in a large organization is advantageous but not essential.
* Proactive in developing and improving processes, solving problems, and creating documentation.
* Excellent communication skills in English, for providing technical advice and information within Sweco IT and the wider business.


**Technical Skills And Experience**
***Entra / Azure / O365***
* User and group management.
* Application and permission management, Role-Based Access Control.
* SSO configurations, SAML, and oAuth authentication.
* Conditional Access and MFA configuration.
* Working knowledge of GraphAPI (using Entra and permission management).
* Knowledge of Active Directory and Entra ID Connect.
* Experience in Powershell scripting and SQL (desirable).
* Subscription and resource management in Azure (desirable).


***Microsoft 365***
* Understand the Microsoft 365 Roadmap and proactively identify, research, and implement beneficial features.
* Troubleshoot, configure, and maintain O365 core services.
* Collaborate with Sweco Enterprise Architects on large organizational projects.
* Advise on applications and services within Office 365, demonstrating and documenting opportunities and limitations.
* Handle incidents and work with external suppliers and stakeholders.


**About You**
 As a person, you are driven, proactive, like to work at a fast pace and find it fun to solve problems. You have an ability to think both short-term and long-term and are passionate about delivering positive results. You are also self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to come up with practical solutions to problems. Finally, you adhere to our core behaviours approachability, commitment, and expertise.
   

  

**Why join Sweco?**
* Professional development opportunities and various training opportunities.
* A pleasant and dynamic working atmosphere in a growing and leading company.
* An industry that is going through a major shift in way of working
* A culture that values inclusion, innovation, and continuous learning


**Application**
 We review applications ongoing so do not wait to submit you application if you are interested in this position. We do not accept applications via email, however if you have any questions regarding the role or the recruitment process, don’t hesitate to contact us. We will get back to all applicants after the recruitment process has been completed.
   

  

 At Sweco, we strive to be a workplace characterized by diversity. We believe that more perspectives broaden our ability to continue to achieve our goals and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
   

  

 Do you want to be part of shaping the future? Then we look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**Contact Us**
 If you want to know more about the position or Sweco as a workplace, please contact Tom Mortimer, Team Manager O365 Management.
   

  

 Background checks will be carried out on the final candidate as part of this recruitment process.
   

  

*Sweco plans and designs the sustainable communities and cities of the future. Together with our customers, our 23,000 architects, engineers and other experts develop solutions to manage urbanization, take advantage of the opportunities of digitalization and make the societies of the future more sustainable. Sweco is the leading consulting company in technology and architecture in Europe with a turnover of approximately SEK 29 billion. The company is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. For further information,* 
*http //www.sweco.se*

title: Supportspecialist, teknik
description:
Vill du arbeta med teknisk support i en samhällsviktig verksamhet där du får använda och utveckla din tekniska kompetens? Vi söker nu en support­specialist med tydlig teknikprofil till vår it-avdelning.
   

  

 Som support­specialist ingår du i enheten för verksamhetsstöd it. Här arbetar du tillsammans med engagerade kollegor för att ge kvalificerad teknisk support och bidra till utvecklingen av våra it-lösningar. Du är en viktig länk mellan användare och teknik, och får möjlighet att arbeta med både daglig support och tekniska förbättringsprojekt.
   

  

**Dina arbetsuppgifter**
* Hantera och lösa tekniska ärenden via ärendehanteringssystem, e-post och telefon.
* Felsökning och administration av behörigheter, applikationer, nätverk (VPN), digital mötesteknik och mobiltelefoni.
* Fördjupad teknisk felsökning i samarbete med andra it-specialister.
* Delta i införande och utveckling av nya tekniska lösningar och system.
* Vara kontaktperson för it-samordnare, it-kontakter och slutanvändare.


**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som har
   

  

* gymnasieexamen eller motsvarande utbildning inom it eller teknik
* flera års erfarenhet av teknisk support och arbete i helpdesk
* mycket god teknisk kunskap om datorer, skrivare, nätverk, digital mötesteknik, mobiltelefoni samt Microsoft- och Adobe-produkter
* erfarenhet av att arbeta med komplexa tekniska miljöer och att snabbt hitta lösningar på tekniska problem.


 Vi söker dig som är
   

  

* serviceinriktad och pedagogisk
* självgående, initiativrik och strukturerad
* samarbetsvillig och prestigelös
* kommunikativ och tydlig, både med användare och kollegor
* nyfiken på ny teknik och trivs i en miljö där du kan bidra med nya idéer.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Om anställningen**
 Anställningen är en tillsvidareanställning med provanställning på 6 månader.
   

  

 Tester kan förekomma i rekryteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass och därmed sker säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll.
   

  

 Åklagarmyndigheten är en beredskapsmyndighet. Vid en anställning kan du komma att krigsplaceras på Åklagarmyndigheten. Läs mer under Jobba hos oss.
   

  

 På grund av arkivbestämmelser sparar vi ansökningar i två år. När du ansöker kommer dina personuppgifter att behandlas enligt offentlighetsprincipen samt dataskyddsförordningen. När du skickar din ansökan till oss, samtycker du till detta.
   

  

**Om Åklagarmyndigheten**
 På Åklagarmyndigheten känner vi stolthet när vi går till jobbet. Tillsammans är vi över 2 200 engagerade och kompetenta medarbetare som står upp för rättssäkerhet, rättstrygghet och demokratiska värden. Oavsett roll i myndigheten så bidrar alla till vårt viktiga samhällsuppdrag.
   

  

 Vill du bli en del av Åklagarmyndigheten? Vi strävar efter att vara en välkomnande och inkluderande arbetsplats som speglar samhällets mångfald.
   

  

 Ansök redan i dag!

title: Product Manager
description:
**Job Summary:**
 We’re looking for a
 **Product Manager** 
 who thrives at the intersection of
 **product strategy and project execution** 
 . This role is a 50/50 blend of
 **Product Management and Project Management** 
 , combining responsibility for development processes with ownership of project delivery across multiple concurrent initiatives.
   

  

 You will work closely with development teams, customers, and internal stakeholders across different locations and time zones, driving initiatives from product concept through delivery while ensuring high-quality results. It is a hands-on position for someone comfortable switching between product thinking, stakeholder alignment, and day-to-day execution.
   

  

 The role is located in
 **Stockholm** 
 (Kista). You will report to Senior Director, Product Manager.
   

  

**Your responsibilities will include:**
**Product Management**
* Manage the product development process from product concept through launch
* Work closely with development teams across the company.
* Work closely with industry customers to understand product purpose and customer training needs.
* Develop educational materials such as step-by-step videos and clinical procedural guidance.
* Prepare marketing and educational materials to support products in the field to ensure customer satisfaction.
* Support the product line lifecycle from strategic planning through tactical activities in collaboration with your manager.


**Project Management**
* Lead multiple concurrent software projects with varying scope, timelines, and budgets
* Drive planning, execution, tracking, and delivery with distributed teams across time zones
* Own delivery commitments, risk management, and project governance
* Manage project budgets and delivery costs
* Act as the primary delivery contact for customers and internal stakeholders


**Requirements:**
* BSc in for example Biology/life science/bio-medical engineering/Medical or other medical background.
* Minimum 3 years of experience in product management, project management, or a hybrid role in software development.
* Proven ability to manage multiple initiatives
* Experience working with distributed teams and external customers
* Hands-on experience with agile development (Scrum, Kanban, or similar)
* Strong stakeholder management and communication skills
* Comfortable owning both planning and day-to-day execution
* Experience with project financials, budgets, or delivery cost tracking
* Proficiency with tools such as Jira, Monday.com, and Office tools
* Fluent in written and spoken English
* Willingness to travel occasionally


**Nice to Have:**
* Background in simulation, medical devices, gaming, or technical product management
* Experience writing PRDs or structured product documentation
* Experience improving or scaling product/project processes
* Power BI or analytics tools
* PMP, CSM, or similar certifications


**Benefits:**
* 🌍 Global environment (English as primary language)
* 💻 Hybrid work
* ⌚️ Flexible working hours
* 🏩 (Optional) Private healthcare
* 💚 Wellness allowance (Friskvårdsbidrag)
* 🚲 (Optional) Bicycle lease


**Surgical Science** 
 is a global organisation and leading provider of medical training simulations and software solutions.
   

  

 Together with healthcare partners and customers in more than 90 countries, we enhance patient safety and healthcare outcomes through evidence-based, state-of-the-art simulation technology that improves clinical proficiency and performance — enabling safe and effective training without putting patients at risk.
   

  

 Our solutions are used by medical training centres, universities, hospitals, and the medical device industry for practice, assessment, and certification.
   

  

 With offices in Gothenburg, Stockholm, Tel Aviv, Cleveland, Cardiff, and Shenzen, we are a fast-growing and stable organisation in a rapidly evolving world. We foster a hybrid work culture that supports onsite and remote collaboration across teams and time zones.
   

  

**Surgical Science as an employer**
 Surgical Science is a global and continuously expanding organisation. You will be part of a dynamic, creative environment where we make sure to allow all employees to influence and contribute with their own unique experiences and knowledge.
   

  

 Guided by our core values —
 **curiosity, respect,** 
 and
 **perseverance** 
 — we strive to empower our people by recognising their strengths, supporting their growth, and creating opportunities to make a real impact.
   

  

 We invite you to join us on this exciting and meaningful journey — to shape the future of medical training and improve care for patients around the world.
   

  

**Apply today!**
 If you think you would fit our fantastic team and enjoy our work environment, apply as soon as possible as recruitment is ongoing. Let us meet and work out together whether we are a match! We kindly request that you apply with a
 **CV and application letter in English.**

title: Group Senior Engineer (m/f/d) - IT Endpoint Management
description:
Become part of a vital chain and contribute to our common goal of making people’s lives better. Octapharma is one of the largest human protein manufacturers in the world, developing and producing medicines sourced from human plasma and human cell lines. We are a privately-owned company, where the warmth of family meets the scale of a global organisation.
   

  

 We're hiring engineers to build innovative solutions in a modern, cloud-based environment. With tools like Microsoft Intune and Windows 365, we offer secure, flexible access to the resources you need—anytime, anywhere. The position will be filled in either
 **Vienna** 
 (Austria),
 **Lachen** 
 (Switzerland),
 **Stockholm** 
 (Sweden) or
 **Lingolsheim** 
 (France).
   

  

 Join us in shaping our vision to provide new health solutions advancing human life.
   

  

 Your main tasks and responsibilities
   

  

* Design and devolpment of endpoint-related solutions and device of management platforms
* Review and oversee the teams demand, intake from the business through project softwares and ticketing systems
* Participate in the design and development of features and systems, from initial architecture through implementation and post-deployment support
* Collaborate with other platform teams to ensure successful deployment of deliverables needed
* Troubleshoot and Provide Tier 3 support to resolve complex technical issues related to endpoint systems and infrastructure


 Your expertise and ideal skill set
   

  

* Bachelor degree in Computer Science or Technical Certifcation courses in IT
* Minimum of 5 years working experience in providing IT technical support or administering IT systems
* Strong experience with Microsoft Intune and On Prem Endpoint systems
* Knowledge of mobile devices, desktop systems, IoT devices and other connected assets
* Fluent English (oral and written)
* Strong communication and presentation skills
* Analytical and conceptual thinking
* Strong prioritization, problem solving, diagnosis and troubleshooting skills


 Your department - where you make an impact
   

  

* We, the Endpoint Team department, are the trusted partner that drives the technical transformation of Octapharma. Together with Business, we create and deliver technical solutions to transform the organisation and improve performance.
* We are a team of Engineers who work on the design, and development of endpoint-related solutions, such as device management platforms.


 Thrive with us
   

  

* Company restaurant & meal subsidy
* Training & further education
* Health promotion
* Parking spaces and good public transport connections
* Company and team events


 Enjoy these attractive benefits! You can find all offers here:
 **Benefits**
 The minimum gross salary according to the
 **austrian collective agreement** 
 (chemical industry) is EUR 4,270.14 based on 38 hours per week (full-time). As we strive to offer a salary that reflects your individual profile and qualifications, there is a willingness to pay above the minimum salary.
   

  

 It´s in our blood
   

  

 We live diversity and stand for equal opportunities as an employer! We therefore look forward to receiving your application - regardless of age, gender, origin, sexual orientation, and religion.
   

  

 Do you have any questions? Then get in touch with your contact person.
   

  

 Mrs. Johanna Proksch
   

  

 Octapharma Pharmazeutika Produktionsges.m.b.H.
   

  

 Oberlaaer Straße 235, 1100 Wien
   

  

 T: +43 (1) 610 32 - 4299
   

  

 You can also reach us Monday to Friday via WhatsApp: +43 (0) 664 88578113
   

  

 Want to find out more about us?
   

  

 Visit our website
 **Octapharma Career** 
 and follow us daily on
 **LinkedIn** 
 .

title: Test Automation Engineer - Shape the Future of Corporate Payments | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
SEB Kort is looking for an experienced, technically strong, and motivated Test Automation Engineer. You are passionate about ensuring software quality and thrive on designing robust test frameworks while working in the area of data enhancement. Joining our dynamic international team spread across multiple countries, you will play a key role in delivering reliable, high-quality solutions and supporting our mission to be the market leader for corporate payments in Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Test Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and reliability of our software solutions through both automated and manual testing. You will design, develop, and maintain automated test frameworks and scripts while also performing functional and exploratory testing. Working in a cross-functional international agile team you will help drive quality assurance best practices and contribute to building robust, scalable systems.
   

  

**Who We Are Looking For**
 You are a detail-oriented professional with a strong passion for quality and automation. You combine analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a team environment. Clear and effective communication comes naturally to you, enabling smooth interaction with cross-functional teams.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Working within a team focused on refining and improving data quality, merging incoming data flows, and generating accurate outputs for invoicing
* Performing manual and exploratory testing to ensure comprehensive coverage.
* Designing and implementing automated test scripts for functional, regression, and integration testing.
* Maintaining and improving existing test automation frameworks.
* Collaborating with development teams to integrate automated tests into CI/CD pipelines.
* Identifying, analyzing, and reporting defects, ensuring timely resolution.
* Promoting quality standards within and across teams.


**Who Succeed In This Role We Believe You Have**
* Successfully completed academic studies in IT or a comparable education
* Extensive experience in quality assurance methods (ISTQB certification is an advantage)
* Practical experience in the field of test automation, agile practices, DevOps and similar methods
* Proficiency in Java (senior level) and solid understanding of object-oriented programming.
* Hands-on experience with BDD frameworks such as Cucumber and writing scenarios in Gherkin.
* Familiarity with GitLab for version control and Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines.
* Knowledge of big data technologies including Hadoop, Kafka, and HBase.
* Ability to design and maintain automated test frameworks and integrate them into complex data-driven environments.
* Strong analytical skills and a proactive approach to problem-solving.
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Excellent office environment
* Work-life balance


**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 10th of March, 2026. If you have questions about the position, please contact Elinor Franzén, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elinor.franzen@seb.se.
   

  

*SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.*
*Learn more about working at SEB here:* 
 www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Service Manager
description:
**Who we’re looking for!**
 We’re excited to announce an opportunity for a Service Manager for our Asset Finance solutions! As a Service Manager, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the success and satisfaction of our clients. This position involves proactive engagement, relationship-building and collaboration with clients to maximize the value they derive from our solutions.
   

  

 As part of our Asset Finance team, you'll help businesses unlock growth by providing innovative financing solutions for essential assets like vehicles and equipment. As a market leader in the Nordics, collaborating with some of the largest car brands, and powering the majority of all Nordic financed cars, you’ll play a key role in creating solutions that make these assets more accessible, enabling clients to achieve ambitious goals and drive lasting success.
   

  

 You’re strongly aligned with our
 **Employee DNA** 
 which celebrates curiosity, collaboration, competence, and customer focus.
   

  

**What does the role look like?**
* Be the contact person for one or more customers and to ensure services are delivered according to agreed quality and profitability
* To be the customers representative inside Banqsoft which means coordination and follow-up on activities internally and to the customer
* Work on client strategies in corporation with Key Account Manager
* Actively contribute to the development of Banqsoft´s delivery towards customers
* Execute client meetings and follow-up and identify actions internally and towards customer
* Support the customer with planning and delivery of IT projects
* Gather customer needs and possibilities as well as communicate these to stakeholders both internally and with the customer
* Ensure effective communication around the customer internally at Banqsoft
* Client negotiations about extensions or changes of Banqsoft´s services


**Succeeding the Banqsoft way – Employee DNA**
**Curiosity:** 
 We embrace the 'Why?’. It’s the spark that ignites learning, innovation, and progress.
   

  

**Collaboration:** 
 Team players with diverse perspectives have more fun building together
   

  

**Competence:** 
 We're hungry for more! Ever ready for new skills and always seeking to learn.
   

  

**Customer Focus:** 
 We're dedicated to enabling our customers' success. We deliver the benefits of technology to make a difference in society, business, and everyday life.
   

  

**Are we a great match?**
 To master the role of Service Manager we believe that you have:
   

  

* A bachelor’s degree in Business, Information Technology, or related field
* Industry experience in IT, banking and/or finance
* 2+ years of working experience in customer success, account management, project management, product management, service management, delivery management or business development
* Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to build great relationships with clients and internal teams
* A service minded attitude, commercially minded and strong project management skills
* You are solution oriented and work well with complex issues and enjoy working with others
* Excellent communication skills in English, both verbally and written
* Strong alignment with our Employee DNA


**It’s great if you have (but not a must!):**
* Experience in ITIL
* Experience of working with international customers


 If you believe this role aligns with your career aspirations, we would very much like to hear from you!

title: Business Unit Manager
description:
**Do you want to take the next step in your career as a Business Unit Manager and develop a business area where technology and leadership are at the core?** 




 Chief has a clear niche and a unique offering in the market. We are now looking for a key person who wants to build a consultant team, shape client relationships, and develop a high-potential business area in Stockholm. We warmly welcome your application!
 



**About the role:** 




 As our
 **Business Unit Manager** 
 , you will have the opportunity to establish and lead your own business area within technology and leadership. The role combines both operational and strategic responsibilities, working closely with our clients and consultants to build long-term relationships and create new business opportunities.
 



**Your main responsibilities include:** 



* Building and leading a team of consultants – identifying, attracting, and recruiting the right talent in close collaboration with internal resources.
* Driving sales and business development, from prospecting to securing new deals and expanding existing collaborations.
* Creating and strengthening client relationships by understanding their needs, ensuring quality, and acting as a strategic partner.
* Developing the business area’s offering in technology and leadership, ensuring it is relevant, competitive, and clearly positioned.
* Taking operational leadership responsibility for the team – coaching, supporting, and enabling consultants’ success, supported by the company’s internal programs and resources.
* Contributing to the long-term strategy of the business area, with a focus on growth, profitability, and quality.



**What we are looking for:** 




 You are someone who enjoys taking responsibility, brings energy to your work, and takes initiative. You like working in a role where both people and business are central, and you have a natural interest in leadership. You feel confident meeting different types of people, enjoy creating structure, and are motivated by seeing tangible results from your work.
 



 To be successful in this role, you need to enjoy sales and feel comfortable driving business processes from start to finish. You have experience working closely with clients and developing business; having budget responsibility is a strong plus. Experience in recruitment or participating in hiring processes is also valuable, as the role involves building a strong team over time.
 



 If this sounds like you, and you have a strong drive to grow as a leader and want to help build something long-term, we believe you will have an exciting journey with us!
 



**We expect that you have:** 



* 5 years of professional experience in the technology/IT field, for example within the energy sector, automotive, Life Science or defense.
* Proven leadership experience and achievements.
* A strong interest in and experience with creating business opportunities through sales.
* An engineering degree or a BSc/MSc in technology, IT, economics, or business.
* Fluent Swedish and English, both spoken and written.



 Having established contacts within the tech and IT sectors is highly meritorious.
 



**Who is Chief?** 




 Chief is a leading player in the consultancy industry, with a strong, family-oriented culture where technology and leadership meet. With us, you’ll find a personal and development-focused environment where career growth and leadership are central — with all the opportunities that come from being part of the global Alten Group.
 



**What do we offer?** 




**Community & development:** 




 We invest in you and your growth through cross-industry and exciting client projects, mentoring programs, Chief Academy, certification opportunities, and other internal initiatives that strengthen both your expertise and your leadership skills.
 



**Greater opportunities:** 




 Local engagement combined with a global network through the Alten Group, offering career paths and exciting assignments — without compromising the family-like atmosphere.
 



**Do you want to help shape the future of technology and leadership?** 
 Then we are the right place for you.

title: Salesforce Technical Specialist
description:
**Role:** 
 Salesforce Technical Specialist
 



**Experience (Years):** 
 15-20 years
 



**Language requirement:** 
 Swedish & English
 



  





**Tata consultancy Services** 
 is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role Summary:** 




  





 The Salesforce Technical Specialist will be responsible for architecting, implementing, and supporting Salesforce-based digital transformation programs across industries including Telecom, retail, consumer goods, distribution, travel, hospitality, Life Sciences, Manufacturing, and Financial Services in the Nordic region. The role requires deep expertise in Salesforce Core Cloud Platforms (Sales, Service) and advanced customization using Apex/Lightning, and strong integration skills with enterprise systems. The candidate will be expected to lead solution design, ensure delivery excellence, and collaborate closely with business and IT stakeholders to drive measurable outcomes.
 



  





**Required Experience** 




  




* 8–12 years of total IT experience in Salesforce ecosystem and overall, 15-20 years of experience
* Proven track record in architecting and implementing Salesforce solutions for enterprise-scale clients.
* Expertise in Apex, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Integration (REST/SOAP, Mulesoft), and CI/CD (Copado/Jenkins).
* Hands-on experience in Agile delivery and DevOps environments.
* Strong communication and stakeholder management skills with Nordic or European client exposure.



  





  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





  





**Portfolio Management** 




  




* Manage a portfolio of Salesforce transformation engagements across multiple Nordic clients.
* Ensure all programs align with enterprise architecture standards, scalability, and best practices.
* Track delivery health, risks, and dependencies across multiple initiatives.



  





**Solutions and Relationship Management** 




  




* Lead technical solutioning during RFPs and client workshops; define architectures, prototypes, and demos.
* Engage with C-level stakeholders to identify business pain points and translate them into scalable Salesforce solutions.
* Support pre-sales with estimation, solution documentation, and proposal development.



  





  





**Delivery Governance** 




  




* Drive high-quality delivery through technical governance, design reviews, and performance audits.
* Mentor and guide offshore/nearshore teams to maintain consistency in development and configuration practices.
* Ensure compliance with security, GDPR, and integration standards specific to the Nordic markets.



  





  





**Qualifications** 




  




* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or related discipline.
* Salesforce Certified Application Architect or System Architect (mandatory).
* Additional certifications (e.g., Platform Developer II, Integration Architect, Industries CPQ Specialist-desirable)



  





  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com** 




  





**Privacy Note: https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

title: Data Scientist - User Fraud
description:
The Platform team creates the technology that enables Spotify to learn quickly and scale easily, enabling rapid growth in our users and our business around the globe. Spanning many disciplines, we work to make the business work; creating the infrastructure, tooling, frameworks, and capabilities needed to welcome a billion customers.
   

  

 We are seeking a data scientist to join the User Fraud R&D Studio. Our mission is to protect Spotify from unwanted behaviour by detecting and preventing fake account creation and artificial streaming activity across all business areas. You will join a cross-functional team of data scientists and machine learning engineers who continuously experiment, iterate and deliver new fraud prevention solutions. Together, we tackle a diverse and evolving set of challenges, study user behaviour, develop data science and machine learning solutions, and bring insights into every decision we make. Your work will directly impact our ability to identify and prevent fraud.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Analyze user and system data to detect and assess risks of artificial or fraudulent activity on Spotify.
* Build data science and machine learning solutions to enable Spotify to quickly and automatically analyze data for fraud prevention.
* Communicate insights and recommendations to non-technical audiences using clear visuals and data storytelling.
* Build scalable data pipelines and dashboards to track our performance and support decision-making.


 Who you Are
   

  

* At least two years of experience working with large, complex datasets using Python, SQL or R. You should also be comfortable creating your own data visualizations using tools like matplotlib, ggplot, looker studio or similar.
* Degree in data science, computer science, statistics, economics, mathematics, or a similar quantitative field.
* Experience and strong understanding of working with data pipelines, anomaly detection methods, statistical modeling and machine learning.
* Strong analytical skills, with the ability to turn data into actionable insights and recommendations.
* Strong problem-solving skills, intellectual curiosity, and a proactive approach to identifying new opportunities for fraud detection and prevention.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in London or Stockholm
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Spotify is an equal opportunity employer. You are welcome at Spotify for who you are, no matter where you come from, what you look like, or what’s playing in your headphones. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace. The more voices we have represented and amplified in our business, the more we will all thrive, contribute, and be forward-thinking! So bring us your personal experience, your perspectives, and your background. It’s in our differences that we will find the power to keep revolutionizing the way the world listens.
   

  

 At Spotify, we are passionate about inclusivity and making sure our entire recruitment process is accessible to everyone. We have ways to request reasonable accommodations during the interview process and help assist in what you need. If you need accommodations at any stage of the application or interview process, please let us know - we’re here to support you in any way we can.
   

  

 Spotify transformed music listening forever when we launched in 2008. Our mission is to unlock the potential of human creativity by giving a million creative artists the opportunity to live off their art and billions of fans the chance to enjoy and be passionate about these creators. Everything we do is driven by our love for music and podcasting. Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Marketing & E-com Internship
description:
At Wakakuu, we are now looking for a highly motivated individual who has a strong interest in working within the fashion industry and wants to join us as a Marketing & E-com Intern, Is it you?
 




  





**Tasks include but are not limited to the following;** 



* Assist the marketing team in daily activities.
* Assist with on-site visual merchandising to ensure a premium and cohesive customer experience.
* Write, edit, and quality-check product descriptions in line with Wakakuu’s tone of voice.
* Support search optimization (SEO) through product texts, titles, and metadata.
* Assist with e-commerce photo shoots, including prepping, steaming, and on-set adjustments.
* Assist with content creation for newsletters, website, and social media channels.
* Support campaign planning, launches, and follow-ups across digital channels.
* Support influencer seeding coordination and tracking when needed.
* Assist with market, competitor, and trend research within fashion and e-commerce.



  





**Qualifications:** 



* A great interest in E-com, Marketing, and Fashion.
* A strong team player and a multitasker
* Good communication skills in both Swedish and English
* Relevant education
* Available for at least 4 months
* Organized, structured and flexible





 ﻿
 





**How to Apply:** 





 If you are enthusiastic about fashion, marketing, and contributing to a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you.
 

 Please send your application, including your CV and cover letter to
 
**jobb@wakakuu.com** 




  






 Applications will be reviewed ongoing.
 





 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Systems Engineer (Presales) - Sweden
description:
**Our Mission**
 At Palo Alto Networks®, we’re united by a shared mission—to protect our digital way of life. We thrive at the intersection of innovation and impact, solving real-world problems with cutting-edge technology and bold thinking. Here, everyone has a voice, and every idea counts. If you’re ready to do the most meaningful work of your career alongside people who are just as passionate as you are, you’re in the right place.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 In order to be the cybersecurity partner of choice, we must trailblaze the path and shape the future of our industry. This is something our employees work at each day and is defined by our values: Disruption, Collaboration, Execution, Integrity, and Inclusion. We weave AI into the fabric of everything we do and use it to augment the impact every individual can have. If you are passionate about solving real-world problems and ideating beside the best and the brightest, we invite you to join us!
   

  

 This role is remote, but distance is no barrier to impact. Our hybrid teams collaborate across geographies to solve big problems, stay close to our customers, and grow together. You will be part of a culture that values trust, accountability, and shared success where your work truly matters.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 Here is the updated job description formatted with bullet points for better readability:
   

  

 Role Overview: Solutions Consultant
   

  

 The Solutions Consultant is the evolution of the traditional Sales Engineering role, aligning how we best serve our customers in understanding their environment, providing solution guidance, and ensuring value realization in their investment with Palo Alto Networks.
   

  

* Technical Leadership: Provide expertise and guidance in your customer’s security transformation journey.
* Strategic Alignment: Play a key role in defining technical solutions that secure a customer’s key business imperatives.
* Value Realization: Ensure customers maximize the return on their investment with Palo Alto Networks.
* Industry Evangelism: Promote our leadership in on-prem, cloud, and security operations to establish PANW as the cybersecurity partner of choice.


 Your Impact
   

  

**Role**
 Curiosity is core to the Solutions Consultant role, and you see complex problems as opportunities to learn and deliver innovative solutions! You define your impact by:
   

  

* Strategic Sales Execution: Meeting and exceeding sales quotas by building and implementing strategic, technical account plans that target cross-platform solutions.
* Solution Design: Understanding key customer business requirements to position, demonstrate, and create high-level designs across the entire PANW portfolio.
* Platform Adoption: Driving customer adoption of the Palo Alto Networks Platform and building relationships that increase customer productivity, operational efficiency, and security efficacy.
* Customer Discovery: Conducting discovery to understand and articulate the key technical, operational, and commercial imperatives of prospects and customers.
* Collaborative Implementation: Working closely with Professional Services, Customer Success, and Specialist teams to ensure successful implementation and adoption.
* Impactful Communication: Influencing through effective presentations and customer-specific demos, simplifying complex ideas for various audiences.
* Technical Validation: Leading successful validation efforts based on best practices to ensure technical wins in assigned opportunities.
* Cross-Functional Leadership: Orchestrating supporting resources (Specialists, Channel Resources, Customer Support) to ensure a "one-team" approach and a cohesive strategy.
* End-to-End Solutions: Promoting services that include PANW and/or partner professional services to ensure customers realize business value sooner.
* Market Intelligence: Understanding the competitive landscape and effectively differentiating PANW's leadership in the cybersecurity space.
* Continuous Development: Investing in technical and professional skills while actively participating in the Solutions Consultant community and industry events.
* Relationship Cultivation: Identifying technical stakeholders and building relationships with key personas to drive a security architecture transformation roadmap.


**Qualifications**
 Your Experience
   

  

 Here is the "Your Experience" section organized into clear, professional bullet points:
   

  

* Pre-Sales Expertise: 6+ years of experience in a pre-sales or sales engineering capacity.
* Domain Specialization: Skilled in at least one of the following areas:
+ Networking & Network Security
+ Cybersecurity
+ Private/Public Cloud Security
+ SOC/Endpoint or SASE

* Problem Solving: Proven track record of delivering cybersecurity solutions that solve complex technical challenges and influence new business initiatives.
* Stakeholder Influence: Experience gaining buy-in from key stakeholders in customer-facing or internal roles; prior pre-sales experience is highly ideal.
* Technical Engagement: Proficient in creating and delivering technical presentations, workshops, and technical validation engagements.
* Product Knowledge: Experience selling, designing, implementing, or managing solutions such as:
+ Network Security
+ SASE & SaaS
+ CNAPP (Cloud Native Application Protection Platforms)
+ SOC Transformation Technologies

* Customer Success Alignment: History of partnering with Customer Support functions to ensure the successful implementation and adoption of sold solutions.
* Complex Sales Mastery: Preferred experience in complex sales cycles involving long timelines, multiple buying centers, and multi-product solutions.
* Field Readiness: This is a field sales position; travel is required to support in-person customer meetings (specifics to be discussed with the recruiter).
* Linguistic Proficiency: Fully proficient in both English and Norwegian.


**Our Commitment**
 We’re trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
   

  

 We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.
   

  

 Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
   

  

 Is role eligible for Immigration Sponsorship? No. Please note that we will not sponsor applicants for work visas for this position.

title: TELETEKNIKER EL/MEKANIK
description:
**TELETEKNIKER - EL/MEKANIK**
 Försvarsmaktens telekommunikations- och informationssystemförband (FMTIS) Genomförandeenhet Mitt har personal i Enköping, Falun, Arboga, Kungsängen, Berga och Visby.
   

  

 Vi söker nu teletekniker med inriktning El och Mekanik till FMTIS genomförandeavdelning på Berga. I rollen som teletekniker hos oss kommer du att vara en viktig del i vår utförande organisation och bidra till att leverera resultat som har betydelse i ett större perspektiv.
   

  

**Om verksamheten**
 FMTIS har fem enheter som utför underhåll av Försvarsmaktens ledningssystem inom IT- och Teleområdet, Genomförandeenhet Mitt är en av dessa enheter.
   

  

 Enheterna arbetar med underhåll av Försvarsmaktens telenät, radio-, sensor-, bevaknings- och fältsystem samt underhåll av en mängd olika IT-System.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**
 Arbetsuppgifterna består av att utföra avhjälpande samt förebyggande underhåll på elverk och strömförsörjnig till olika anläggningar inom militärregion mitt. I arbetet ingår även att utföra underhåll av utrustning i Mast och Torn, stödja kolleger inom egen sektion och avdelning samt vara ett tekniskt stöd till övriga förband i Försvarsmakten.
   

  

 Arbetet medför resor i tjänsten både på land och till havs i skärgårdsmiljö. Vissa arbetsuppgifter utförs i Mast och Torn vilket ställer krav på godkänd läkarundersökning och därefter utbildning internt inom Försvarsmakten för arbete på hög höjd (klättring).
   

  

 Du arbetar i huvudsak tillsammans med närmsta tekniklag och tjänsten erbjuder en stor variation i ett stimulerande och betydelsefullt verksamhetsområde.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
 I Försvarsmakten finns en stark värdegrund som bygger på öppenhet, resultat och ansvar.
   

  

 Verksamheten erbjuder variation och komplexitet samt goda möjligheter för utbildning och personlig utveckling.
   

  

 Våra anställda har ett flertal olika förmåner, bland annat:
   

  

 Individuell kompetensutveckling framförallt inom eget teknikområde.
   

  

 Tre timmar FYS i veckan under arbetstid.
   

  

 Bra balans mellan arbete och fritid med flexibel arbetstid, samt 28-35 semesterdagar beroende på ålder.
   

  

 Lönetillägg vid föräldraledighet och VAB, samt möjlighet att växla semesterdagar mot extra pensionsavsättning.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Treårig Gymnasieutbildning med inriktning mot EL/TELE eller motasvarande kunskaper som kan bedömas likvärdig
   

  

 God förmåga att förstå instruktioner och anvisningar på svenska och engelska
   

  

 Körkort B (Manuell växellåda)
   

  

 Godkänd läkarundersökning för Mast och Torn (utförs under provanställning)
   

  

**Meriterande**
 El Behörighet
   

  

 Erfarenhet av arbete med Elverk, UPS, Strömförsörjning
   

  

 Kunskap om Mätteknik och Felsökning
   

  

 Körkortsbehörigheter, Nautisk behörighet, Förarbevis
   

  

 Fullgjord värnplikt eller GMU
   

  

 Mekaniskt kunnig
   

  

**Personliga egenskaper**
 Vi söker dig som har ett stort engagemang, är serviceinriktad, positiv och löser dina uppgifter med hög kvalitet. Du har förmågan att följa tekniska instruktioner och beskrivningar samt är mån om att leverera ett bra slutresultat oavsett arbetsuppgift.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du är en person som vill utvecklas och vidareutbildas inom ditt teknikområde. Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid personlig lämplighet.
   

  

**Tillträde**
 Befattningen är en tillsvidareanställning med sex månaders provanställning. Tillträde enligt överenskommelse.
   

  

**Övrigt**
 Befattningen benämns Teleingenjör och placeringsort är Berga.
   

  

 Tjänsteresor och övernattning på annan ort förekommer.
   

  

 Mast och Torn utbildning genomförs under provanställning (klättring).
   

  

**Kontaktuppgifter**
 Upplysningar om befattningen lämnas av sektionschef: Henrik Wesslén via växeln på 08 - 788 75 00
   

  

 Fackliga kontaktpersoner FMTIS:
   

  

 SACO-F Agnetha Landquist
   

  

 OFR/S Martin Sparr
   

  

 OFR/O Heikki Widell
   

  

 SEKO Matz Felix
   

  

 Samtliga nås via växeln på 08-788 75 00
   

  

 Ansökan
   

  

 Ansök via www.forsvarsmakten.se/Jobba/Lediga-jobb/
   

  

 Sista ansökningsdatum
   

  

 Välkommen med din ansökan senast 2026-03-13. Din ansökan skall innehålla CV samt personligt brev.
   

  

 ,
 **Ansökningar till denna befattning kommer endast tas emot via Försvarsmaktens webbplats.** 
 -------------------------------------------------------- Information om Försvarsmakten och det rekryterande förbandet: Försvarsmaktens telekommunikations- och informationssystemförband, FMTIS, säkerställer Försvarsmaktens förmåga att kommunicera och leda - dygnet runt, året om. Förbandet har ett samlat ansvar för Försvarsmaktens tekniska ledningssystem som stödjer militära insatser till sjöss, på land och i luften – i Sverige och utomlands. Förbandet har närmare 2000 medarbetare på mer än 32 orter runt om i landet. Läs mer på https://jobb.forsvarsmakten.se/fmtis En anställning hos oss innebär placering i säkerhetsklass. Vanligtvis krävs svenskt medborgarskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kommer att genomföras före anställning enligt 3 kap i säkerhetsskyddslagen. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras samt att tjänstgöra utomlands. Innebörden av detta varierar beroende på typ av befattning. Till ansökan om anställning ska CV och personligt brev bifogas. Om du går vidare i anställningsprocessen ska alltid vidimerade kopior av betyg och intyg uppvisas. Samtal från externa rekryteringsföretag och säljare undanbedes.

title: Solutions Architect
description:
**Job Title:** 
 Solutions Architect
 



**Seniority Level:** 
 Senior
 



**Location:** 
 Stockholm-Arlanda, Sweden
 



**Remote Work:** 
 Not available
 



**Assignment Period:** 
 01 Mar 2026 – 31 Dec 2026
 



**Contract Type:** 
 Full-time, on-site
 



**Language Requirement:** 
 Swedish (Native)
 



  





**Job Description** 




**Key Responsibilities** 



* Describe, implement, and develop IT architecture for various operational areas within airport environments.
* Support ongoing projects through solution design and documentation.
* Play a central role in projects focused on comprehensive airport management through data collection, analysis, forecasting, and stakeholder communication.
* Ensure IT systems are cost-effective, secure, scalable, functional, and aligned with business requirements.
* Ensure IT solutions meet current and future operational needs, adhering to architectural principles, rules, and guidelines.
* Collaborate closely with internal teams and external suppliers, actively participating in procurement and implementation of new IT systems.



  





**Requirements** 



* Minimum 5 years' experience as a solutions architect in complex IT environments.
* At least 5 years in system development with strong knowledge of IT infrastructure.
* Minimum 5 years' experience with databases, system integration, and authentication.
* At least 5 years’ experience with Microsoft platforms.
* At least 5 years’ experience working with cloud services, preferably Azure.
* Strong experience (5+ years) in both strategic and operational IT security aspects.



  





**Required Skills** 



* IT Infrastructure
* Authentication
* Solutions Architect
* IT Security
* Azure
* Databases
* System Development
* Integration
* Microsoft Platforms



  





**Benefits** 



* Opportunity to be a key player in shaping digital transformation within the aviation sector
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams on high-impact projects



  





 Ready to take the next step in your architecture career? Apply today and help shape the future of digitalized airport operations!

title: Specialister inom Datacenter nät och Nätsäkerhet
description:
emagine söker efter två specialister inom Datacenter nät och Nätsäkerhet för en väldigt spännande kund.
   

  

**Start: ASAP (efter säkerhetsklassning) kan bli i mars , Men processen startar nu**
**Längd: 6 månader till att börja med**
**Plats: Stockholm, man måste vara villig/kunna vara på plats upp till 5 dagar i veckan**
 Syfte med rollen
   

  

 Ansvarar för att utveckla, förvalta och säkra organisationens datacenter nätverk och nätverksinfrastruktur.
   

  

 Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden
   

  

* Designa, implementera och vidareutveckla datacenter nätverk.
* Säkerställa stabil drift, kapacitet och redundans.
* Ansvara för nätverkssäkerhet (brandväggar, IDS/IPS, VPN, Zero Trust).
* Säkerställa efterlevnad av NIS2, ISO27001 och relevanta regelverk.
* Implementera nätövervakning, loggning och incidentberedskap.
* Samverka med IT-drift, säkerhetsteam och leverantörer.


 Kravprofil
   

  

* Flerårig erfarenhet av datacenter nätverk i komplexa miljöer.
* Djup kunskap inom routing/switching (BGP, OSPF, VLAN, EVPN).
* Erfarenhet av nätverkssäkerhet och segmentering.
* Meriterande med cloud networking och automatisering.


 Personliga egenskaper
   

  

* Analytisk och strukturerad.
* Hög säkerhetsmedvetenhet.
* Stark samarbetsförmåga och tydlig kommunikation.


 Strategisk betydelse
   

  

 Rollen är central för att säkerställa en robust, framtidssäkrad och cybersäkra digital infrastruktur.
   

  

**Övrigt**
* Säkerhetsklassad tjänst: Drog- och alkoholtest, bakgrundskontroll samt säkerhetsprövning krävs. Svenskt medborgarskap är ett krav och ska kunna flytande svenska, tal och skrift

title: Scrum Master
description:
**Requirement**
* 15 years exp is required.
* Analyze business requirements, technical functionality, system processes and solution designs
* Write, maintain and develop system, business and functional requirements to guide the development work with our new payment infrastructure platform
* Maintain and develop systems for requirement management, documentation and follow-up
* Manage relation and drive discussions with internal/external stakeholders and development teams
* Be part of a cross functional agile team in the Payment Execution Agile Release Train that run the SAFe agile framework.
* Work closely and learn from domain experts in payments, architecture and mainframe systems
* Develop yourself, contribute to the development of your team and the entire release train.
* Be part of a dynamic environment with cross functional teams that share challenges and build knowledge together


**Skills/experience Needed In This Role**
* At least 15 years' experience from requirement work in complex software systems
* Knowledge of common methods and tools used in requirement management
* Experience from banking, finance or insurance industries
* Work experience from the payment domain is an advantage
* Experience from ongoing initiatives such as ISO20022, Bank/plusgiro transformation, SEPA or similar is helpful
* A team player with good collaboration and communication skills
* Experience from agile ways of working, e.g. SAFe, scrum etc
* Ability to communicate with IT and business stakeholders to reach a common understanding of the work that needs to be done
* A driven, proactive, self-organized and an analytical approach with a strive to continuously improve
* Proficient in English, spoken and written, Swedish is a plus

title: Procurement Manager
description:
Country: Sweden
   

  

 We are looking for a
 **Procurement Manager** 
 to join our Nordic procurement team, working closely with Sourcing colleagues based in Norway and Sweden. In this role, you will be responsible for sourcing to Nordic locations, collaborating with stakeholders across all Nordic countries as well as managing relationships with global vendors.
   

  

 You will contribute to strategic sourcing, supplier management, and continuous improvement initiatives in a cross-border, multicultural environment, ensuring efficient, compliant, and value-creating procurement processes that support our Nordic business operations.
   

  

 As a
 **Procurement Manager** 
 , you will take an important role in the team supporting selected areas in the bank with Procurement related tasks. You will take lead in simplification & standardization initiatives to optimize the procurement process, ensuring swift and secure handling of the bank’s purchases.
   

  

 Working in a highly regulated environment raises the stakes, and we need to work closely with our suppliers in complex value chains. This is an excellent opportunity for the right candidate to be working alongside and learn from senior professionals of different cultures and a multitude of competencies.
   

  

**Main Responsibilities for the role:**
* Support for business functions in sourcing activities to secure service quality and cost effectiveness
* Work collaboratively coordinating sourcing activities between the respective stakeholders (e.g. legal & compliance, IT / security and cost management)
* You will take lead in negotiations and RFP processes with material vendors within dedicated area
* Collaborate with the procurement team to ensure optimal lead time in procurement processes
* Secure compliance with the Nordic sourcing policies and governance within all business functions
* Secure commercially healthy sourcing agreements supporting business growth
* Be Nordic point of contact for vendors within dedicated area
* Support in the development and improvement of processes and procedures in Sourcing
* Promote sourcing awareness within Nordics
* Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to establish, monitor, and ensure compliance with contractual agreements and Service Level Agreements (SLAs)
* Monitor ongoing vendor performance


**Skills & Requirements**
 To succeed in this role, we believe that you have the following qualifications and/or experience:
   

  

* Bachelor's degree in technology, business, finance, political science, law, statistics, or equivalent (or documented relevant working experience in related fields)
* Experience within procurement & procurement processes in the Nordics
* Good teamworking skills and experience from working across functions
* Good presentation skills and experience from addressing senior management
* Structured and with attention to details
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
* Ability to manage multiple priorities and projects in parallel
* Fluent English verbal and written communication skills and we also expect fluent in Norwegian or Swedish.


**For further information and application deadline**
 Regarding this position, please contact Ricky Jonsson, Head of Sourcing, by telephone +46 (0)73 046 58 39.
   

  

 Interviews will be conducted on rolling basis and application deadline is 15 February 2026.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 We perform background checks on all relevant candidates. For positions that require authorization and/or confirmation of suitability, a police certificate of good conduct and credit check must be presented. Background check is carried out with prior consent from the candidate.

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Är du sugen på en ny utmaning där du får använda din kompetens inom .NET, C#, React och TypeScript för att bygga skräddarsydda IT-lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Då kan detta vara rätt utmaning för dig.
   

  

 Vi söker fullstackutvecklare med gedigen kompetens inom antingen .NET/C# eller Java, kombinerat med React och Typescript på frontend-sidan.
   

  

**Vi tror på utvecklare som omfamnar framtiden!**
 Det innebär att du inte bara vet hur bra kod ska göras, utan också är nyfiken på och skicklig i att använda moderna AI-verktyg som Cursor, Roo Code, Copilot och liknande. För dig är inte dessa verktyg ett komplement, de är en naturlig del av hur du orkestrerar agenter att utföra uppgifter åt dig för att arbeta smartare, snabbare och mer kreativt.
   

  

**Vad gör vi?**
 Vi på Decerno är specialister på skräddarsydda digitala lösningar och är stolta över att våra uppdrag bidrar till samhällsnytta.
   

  

 Det betyder att vi förstår att alla kunder är olika och har unika förutsättningar. Vi skräddarsyr våra lösningar utefter kundens behov vilket medför att våra medarbetare får möjlighet att arbeta i varierande och spännande projekt med olika tekniker.
   

  

 Samtidigt som vi skapar digitala lösningar vill vi också göra skillnad på riktigt. Det är inte bara något vi säger, vi menar det! Sedan vår start 1984 har vår etiska policy varit vår kompass och vi väljer aktivt bort projekt inom vapenindustri, spel, tobak och alkohol.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som utvecklare hos oss kommer får du en varierad vardag och möjlighet att jobba inom (men inte uteslutande med) utveckling främst i React, .NET/C#, Java, SQL eller Azure.
   

  

 Vi lägger stor vikt vid att bemanna våra projekt med Decernos egna anställda och tillsammans delar ni med er av olika erfarenheter och hjälper varandra genom projektets alla faser.
   

  

 Placeringen är i Stockholm eller Göteborg och vi erbjuder en hybrid arbetsform. Vi tror på att kunna erbjuda våra medarbetare flexibilitet och möjligheten att balansera egna behov och förutsättningar med projektets krav. För den som är placerad i Göteborg kan resor till Stockholm förekomma. Tjänsten är en tillsvidareanställning med sex månaders provanställning.
   

  

**Är det här du?**
* Du har minst tre års erfarenhet av C#/.NET eller Java
* Du har minst tre års erfarenhet av React eller något annat modernt JavaScript-ramverk, gärna med god vana av TypeScript
* Skicklig i att använda moderna AI-verktyg som exempelvis Cursor, Roo Code, Copilot och liknande
* Har ett genuint intresse för AI och LLM-teknologier, och aktivt följer med i vad som händer på området
* Är nyfiken, lösningsorienterad och älskar att utforska hur AI-drivna verktyg kan lyfta ditt arbete till nästa nivå
* Du är flytande i svenska i såväl tal som skrift


 Det är meriterande om du har tidigare erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med Azure, DevOps, integrationer, .NET web API, CSS, AI eller maskininlärning.
   

  

**Därför ska du välja Decerno**
 I våra medarbetarundersökningar blir det gång på gång tydligt att det är de fantastiska kollegorna, de roliga och utmanande projekten och möjligheten att kunna bidra till samhällsnytta som gör att våra medarbetare trivs så bra på Decerno.
   

  

 Sedan finns det också några ytterligare aspekter vilka vi ser som självklarheter:
   

  

* En flexibel arbetsplats med större frihet att planera vardagen för att få arbete och privatliv att gå ihop
* Extra föräldraförmåner eftersom vi tycker att familjen är viktigast
* Vi tycker att din kompetensutveckling är viktig! Därför anordnar vi interna utbildningar löpande i vår egen Dec Academy, gör satsningar inom AI, håller i bokcirklar och arrangerar årliga konferenser
* Vi vill att du ska må bra, trivas och ha roligt på arbetet och därför arrangerar vi regelbundet olika sociala aktiviteter, utmaningar och hälsotävlingar – såväl virtuellt som på plats


 Utöver detta erbjuder vi även ett brett förmånspaket som inkluderar bland annat friskvårdsbidrag och ett generöst försäkringspaket. Vi berättar gärna mer om du vill veta vad mer vi på Decerno skulle kunna erbjuda dig.
   

  

**Låter detta som ditt nästa steg i karriären?** 
  

  

 Vad kul! Då ser vi fram emot att läsa din ansökan så snart som möjligt.

title: Finance Processing Lead
description:
Tata consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role: Finance Processing Lead** 




**Technical Skill Required:** 
 SAP S4 FICO
 



**Experience (Years): 15+ Years** 




  





**Must-Have:** 




  




* Business Process Lead with Strong process knowledge and experience in planning & conducting process workshops and do FIT/GAP analysis in Finance Processes
* Minimum of 15+ years of experience in SAP FICO Modules
* Experienced in implementing FICO modules, S/4 HANA Implementation experience required
* Hand-On with Process modelling tools Signavio preferred, other process modelling tools
* Experience on
* Represent in Process Board & Solution Design authority board on critical Process GAPs / Architecture solution review and decision documentation.
* Ensure Fit to Standard and govern clean core principles with technical architects
* Business process design documentation and coordinate with Process owners for review & ensure Sign-off
* Strong Knowledge on Material Ledger, Universal ledger, GL, AP, AR, CO-PA, Process integration with other Procure to Pay, Order to cash process is required.
* Experience / Capability knowledge on SAP Open Text VIM Solution is preferred
* Hands on experience on Configuration in system is preferred
* Work with Business and Change management lead to draw out Change Impacts list
* Understanding of LTMC and Data Migration capabilities to coordinate with data management team
* Understanding of role-based process design and Fiori role design coordination with Roles & Authorization team is required
* Functional design ownership on solution fitment meets process design and business requirement
* Good communication skills, problem solving mindset and cross functional coordination skills required



  





**Good-To-Have:** 




  




* Strong implementation Experience in SAP S/4 FICO.
* Knowledge in Retail business



  





**Roles & Responsibility:** 




  




* Should be able to analyze the critical issue and resolve in time
* Willingness to accept development challenges and work towards resolving them
* Should be a good team player and should be able to lead the team
* Should be willing to work in shifts
* Should be focused in on-time delivery



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com**

title: Förvaltningsansvarig fibernät, Huddinge kommun
description:
Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-leveranser i en samhällsviktig verksamhet? Vi söker nu en erfaren och driven förvaltningsansvarig för fibernät, med delegerat nätägaransvar, som tar helhetsgrepp om kommunens fibernät. Passar detta in på dig och det du söker? Då tycker vi att du ska läsa vidare!
   

  

**Om enheten**
 Digitaliseringsavdelningen på Huddinge kommun står inför en spännande resa under de kommande åren då kommunen satsar på att bli en av Sveriges främsta digitaliseringskommuner. Avdelningen består av sektionerna Arkitektur och Innovation, Samordnad verksamhetsutveckling, Digital drift samt Digitalt stöd. Vi är cirka 80 medarbetare och leds av framtidsdirektören som rapporterar till kommundirektören och ingår i Huddinge kommuns ledningsgrupp.
   

  

 Vårt uppdrag är att leverera IT- och digitaliseringstjänster som är anpassade till verksamheternas mål och behov, och samtidigt proaktivt leda verksamheterna igenom den digitala transformationen.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Huddinge kommun är idag både ledningsägare och operatör av ett omfattande kommunalt fibernät som sträcker sig över hela kommunen. Detta gör oss till en av de största aktörerna på marknaden, även i jämförelse med privata aktörer.
   

  

 Som förvaltningsansvarig kommer du att äga strategin, utvecklingen och förvaltningen av Huddinge kommuns fibernät. Du rapporterar till chefen för sektionen Digital drift och ingår i ett engagerat team som tillsammans driver digitaliseringen framåt för hela kommunen.
   

  

**Dina ansvarsområden i rollen som förvaltningsansvarig för fibernät:**
* Vidareutveckla och förankra strategin kring kommunens fibernät.
* Ansvara för utveckling och expansion av kommunens framtida nät.
* Ta fram investeringskalkyler och budgetering för nätet.
* Samverka och förankra med verksamheter och interna intressenter.
* Leda och genomföra projektering av fibernätsarbeten, inklusive schakt och infrastruktur.
* Leda projekt och samarbeta med entreprenörer.
* Hantera markfrågor kopplade till nätet.
* Ansvara för beredskapsplanering och nätets driftsäkerhet.
* Samordna utbyggnadsprojekt med övriga ledningsnät.
* Kvalitetssäkra arbeten och projekt.
* Upprätta och följa upp förvaltningsplaner för befintligt nät.
* Delta i samverkansmöten med olika ledningsintressenter.
* Rapportera och följa upp nätets status och projekt.


**Din profil**
 Vi ser gärna att du har en eftergymnasial utbildning inom exempelvis telekommunikation, nätverk, IT-infrastruktur, samhällsbyggnad, elkraft eller annan utbildning som är relevant för rollen. Vi söker också dig med flerårig erfarenhet från en liknande roll inom kommun, offentlig sektor eller större organisation. Vidare är du lösningsorienterad, självgående och motiveras av att bidra till utveckling och förändring. Du är lyhörd, tydlig och kommunikativ, och tar ansvar när det behövs.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* God förmåga att hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt och prioritera effektivt.
* Erfarenhet av strategiskt ansvar och förvaltning av fibernät, inklusive projektering.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet av markfrågor i samband med nätutbyggnad.
* Kommunikativ och van presentatör.
* God erfarenhet av ledningssamordning och projektledning.
* Hög integritet och professionell etik.
* Förmåga att hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt och prioritera effektivt.
* God förmåga att uttrycka sig i tal och skrift i svenska språket.


**Varför Huddinge?**
 För att vi ska kunna utföra vårt uppdrag är du som medarbetare i Huddinge kommun det viktigaste vi har. Därför erbjuder vi en rad förmåner för ett hållbart arbetsliv och för att underlätta din vardag.
   

  

 https://www.huddinge.se/arbete-och-karriar/arbeta-i-huddinge-kommun/#Formaner
   

  

**Upplysningar**
 Vid frågor om tjänsten, vänligen kontakta Thomas Odhelius, Sektionschef Digital drift på thomas.odhelius@huddinge.se
   

  

 Välkommen in med din ansökan!
   

  

**Om arbetsplatsen** 
 I Huddinge kommun arbetar vi för att skapa ett hållbart samhälle, där natur, teknik och god service samspelar. Huddinge är en stor Stockholmskommun med cirka 6 400 medarbetare och fler än 110 000 invånare. Hos oss känner du dig trygg, delaktig och stolt när vi med kraft gör skillnad, varje dag.
 **Facklig kontaktperson**
 För facklig kontaktperson för tjänsten se Facklig kontaktinformation
   

  

**Anställningens omfattning**
 Anställningsform: Tillsvidareanställning
   

  

 Omfattning: Heltid
   

  

**Ansökan**
 Ansök senast: 2026-02-23
   

  

 Referensnummer: C301731
   

  

**Anställning**
 Antal annonserade arbetstillfällen: 1
   

  

*Vi undanber oss alla erbjudanden om annonsering och rekryteringshjälp i samband med denna annons.*

title: Embedded Software Engineer – utveckla teknik som gör skillnad!
description:
Vi söker nu en
 **Embedded Software Engineer** 
 som vill arbeta med avancerade och samhällsviktiga projekt inom industrin, där
 **robusta och tillförlitliga inbyggda system** 
 står i fokus. Hos oss får du möjlighet att ta dig an tekniska utmaningar i komplexa miljöer och bli en del av ett team som värdesätter kvalitet, samarbete och innovation.
 



  





 I rollen arbetar du med utveckling och vidareutveckling av inbyggda system i tekniskt avancerade miljöer. Du är delaktig genom hela utvecklingskedjan – från kravanalys och design till implementation, test och verifiering – i nära samarbete med kollegor inom mjukvara, hårdvara och system. Här får du möjlighet att påverka tekniska beslut och leverera mjukvara som används i
 **kritiska och långsiktiga system** 
 .
 



  





**Vi söker dig som har:** 




  




* Minst
 **3–4 års erfarenhet** 
 av embedded software-utveckling
* Mycket goda programmeringskunskaper i
 **C/C++**
* Erfarenhet av
 **Python**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med
 **realtidssystem** 
 eller
 **resursbegränsade system**
* Erfarenhet av
 **test och testautomatisering** 
 inom embedded-miljö
* **Flytande** 
 svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift



  





**Det är ett plus om du har:** 




  




* Erfarenhet av
 **Java** 
 och/eller
 **MATLAB**
* Bakgrund inom svensk
 **high-tech elektronik** 
 ,
 **försvars-** 
 eller
 **fordonsindustri**
* Kunskap om
 **funktionell säkerhet** 
 , relevanta
 **standarder** 
 och/eller arbete i
 **reglerade miljöer**
* Erfarenhet av
 **CI/CD** 
 , versionshantering (Git, CVS m.fl.) och
 **DevOps-principer**



  





 Vi erbjuder uppdrag i
 **Stockholm, Västerås och Örebro** 
 , beroende på din profil och önskemål.
 







**Vad erbjuder vi?** 




 Varje medarbetare är lika viktig i ALTENs framgång! Vi tror på att växa tillsammans genom att erbjuda möjligheter, utveckling och gemenskap. ALTEN verkar inom flera olika branscher, har en stor variation av uppdrag, coachande chefer och utbildning via ALTEN Academy vilket gör att det alltid kommer vara möjligt att utvecklas hos oss. Dina önskemål styr din väg framåt.
 



 Som konsult får du både en teamkänsla i ditt uppdrag och en riktigt härlig gemenskap på ALTEN. Genom våra interna nätverk såsom Women@ALTEN och ALTEN Sports ges du möjlighet att driva frågor och aktiviteter som just du brinner för. På ALTEN tycker vi det är viktigt med balans mellan arbete och fritid, därför erbjuder vi tre extra lediga dagar per år. Hos oss är du ansluten till kollektivavtal och erbjuds förmåner så som friskvårdsbidrag, tjänstepension och försäkringar.
 



  





**Om ALTEN** 




 ALTEN är ett av Europas största teknik- och IT-konsultföretag med över 57 000 anställda cirka 30 länder. Våra ingenjörer utför komplexa och mycket tekniska projekt genom hela produktutvecklingskedjan hos de främsta företagen inom flera olika branscher såsom Fordon, Försvar & Säkerhet, Energi, Industriell utrustning, Public service samt Life sciences. I Sverige är vi cirka 1300 engagerade medarbetare med 9 kontor i 9 städer - från Lund i söder till Skellefteå i norr.
 



 ALTEN har för femte året i rad utsetts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare av Karriärföretagen, en utmärkelse för arbetsgivare som erbjuder unika karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter.
 



 Välkommen in att läsa mer om oss på alten.se

title: Automation Engineer
description:
*Vi tror att framsteg och möjligheter skapas bäst tillsammans. Välkommen till en plats där samarbete gör skillnad.*
**Din roll**
 Som erfaren Automationsingenjör inom Saab Group IT blir du en nyckelspelare i vårt nystartade, agila team inom Business Applications. Vi befinner oss i en expansiv fas där IT är motorn i våra framgångsrika projekt, och här får du chansen att vara med och bygga framtidens system från grunden.
   

  

**I ditt dagliga arbete kommer du att:**
* Utveckla, testa och drifta IT-system med ett starkt fokus på kontinuerliga leveranser och automatisering.
* Arbeta nära verksamheten för att säkerställa att våra tekniska lösningar möter verkliga behov och krav.
* Proaktivt föreslå teknikval och bidra med din expertis inom mjukvaruutveckling för att driva oss framåt.
* Dela med dig av din kunskap och ansvara för kompetensöverföring inom teamet för att stärka vår gemensamma förmåga.


 Vi erbjuder en flexibel arbetsmiljö där vi kombinerar remote-arbete och virtuellt samarbete med regelbundna fysiska träffar vid våra hubbar för att stärka teamkänslan.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker dig som är en trygg och självständig tekniker med förmågan att se helheten utan att tappa fokus på detaljerna. Som person är du en prestigelös lagspelare som trivs med stort eget ansvar och som motiveras av att arbeta i en miljö där nyfikenhet och värdeskapande står i centrum.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har:
   

  

* 8–10 års erfarenhet inom branschen och en relevant teknisk utbildning.
* Ett starkt intresse för DevOps och DevSecOps-metodik.
* God kommunikationsförmåga på både svenska och engelska.


**Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:**
* Containers och virtualiserad drift samt automatisering via Bash, Python eller Go.
* CI/CD-verktyg såsom GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps eller GitLab.
* Infrastructure as Code (Terraform/Ansible) samt testautomatisering.
* PKI-hantering och certifikatautomation.


 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad blir du en del av**
 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 27 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.

title: Configuration Manager
description:
**With a passion for life**
 Join our diverse teams of passionate people and a career that allows you to develop both personally and professionally. At Getinge we exist to make life-saving technology accessible for more people.
