title: Account Executive - Sweden
description:
**About AvePoint**
 Beyond Secure. AvePoint is the global leader in data security, governance, and resilience, going beyond traditional solutions to ensure a robust data foundation and enable organizations everywhere to collaborate with confidence. Over 25,000 customers worldwide rely on the AvePoint Confidence Platform to prepare, secure, and optimize their critical data across Microsoft, Google, Salesforce, and other collaboration environments. AvePoint’s global channel partner program includes approximately 5,000 managed service providers, value-added resellers, and systems integrators, with our solutions available in more than 100 cloud marketplaces. To learn more, visit
 **www.avepoint.com** 
 .
   

  

 At AvePoint, we are committed to investing in our people. Agility, passion and teamwork set us up to do our best work and foster a culture where you are empowered to craft your career, make an impact, and own (y)our future. Unleash the power of you!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an Account Manager, you will be responsible for managing and expanding a portfolio of existing mid-sized enterprise customers. Your primary focus will be on driving renewals, identifying upsell and cross-sell opportunities, and ensuring customer satisfaction through a consultative sales approach.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Own and grow a defined book of existing mid-market accounts across the Netherlands/Belgium.
* Drive revenue growth through upsell and cross-sell of AvePoint’s SaaS solutions.
* Lead the full sales cycle from discovery to close, in collaboration with SEs and Customer Success.
* Maintain high levels of customer engagement and satisfaction to ensure renewals.
* Develop account plans aligned with customer business goals and technology roadmaps.
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders (e.g. Marketing, Product, Support) to deliver value to customers.
* Track and report on pipeline, forecast, and account health using CRM tools.


**What You Bring**
* 5+ years of B2B sales experience, including 3+ years in full-cycle closing roles.
* Proven success in managing and growing existing accounts.
* Familiarity with Microsoft 365 ecosystem and SaaS sales.
* Experience with MEDDIC, Challenger, or similar sales methodologies.
* Strong communication skills in English and Swedish (written and verbal), any other Scandinavian language is a plus.
* Ability to build executive-level relationships and influence decision-makers.


 We’re looking for someone who thrives in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and embodies our core values:
   

  

* Customer-Centricity: You put the customer at the heart of everything you do.
* Accountability: You take ownership of your goals and deliver with integrity.
* Curiosity: You’re eager to learn, adapt, and grow with the business.
* Team Spirit: You collaborate openly, support your peers, and celebrate shared success.
* Drive: You’re proactive, resilient, and motivated to exceed expectations.


 AvePoint is proud to employ talent from many different backgrounds, experiences, and identities. We believe that diversity and inclusion drives our success and is at the core of how we hire, communicate, and collaborate to deliver value and excellence. We are committed to fostering an environment where people can bring their whole selves to work and feel a sense of belonging, and we continue to work toward creating a workforce that represents the diversity of our customers and communities.
   

  

 Any personal data you share with us during the application process will be processed strictly in compliance with applicable data protection laws and our Privacy Notice.

title: Solution Architect - Shape the Future of Corporate Payments | SEB Kort, Solna
description:
SEB Kort is looking for a technically strong and motivated Solution Architect. You are passionate about modern Java-based software architecture and scalable platforms. You thrive on designing clean, future-proof systems and guiding engineering teams toward high-quality, reliable solutions.
   

  

 Joining our international team across several countries, you will play a key role in shaping our platform architecture and supporting our ambition to become the market leader for corporate payments in Europe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Solution Architect, you will play a key role in shaping and guiding the technical direction of our Java-based platform, authentication services, and surrounding MS Azure based cloud infrastructure. You will work closely with the Product Owner and engineering teams to define solution designs, ensure architectural coherence and support deployments of critical components in complex, distributed environments. As part of an international agile team setup, you will drive architectural best practices and contribute to building secure, scalable, well monitored and reliable systems.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced solution architect with a strong background in designing and guiding complex distributed systems. You combine deep technical expertise with the ability to structure, communicate, and drive architectural decisions in cross functional teams. You enjoy transforming business and nonfunctional requirements into robust technical designs and feel comfortable navigating security, performance, and regulatory constraints. You are collaborative, pragmatic, and able to balance strategic thinking with handson support during implementation.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Leading the incremental development of solution designs in close collaboration with the agile teams.
* Developing network, deployment, security, monitoring, and database concepts as part of the overall solution design, involving relevant stakeholders.
* Supporting the Product Owner in writing user stories that cover non-functional requirements and required operational procedures for production.
* Defining and executing tests derived from non-functional requirements (e.g., performance, failover, observability).
* Supporting hands- develop of explorative prototypes


**Who We Are Looking For**
* Strong experience as a Solution Architect designing highly integrated systems with demanding non-functional requirements
* Deep expertise in Java/Spring Boot and microservice architectures
* Hands-on programming expertise
* Solid understanding of security, authentication/authorization, and financial industry regulations (ISO27001, PCI DSS, GoBD; GDPR a plus)
* Experience with deployments in low latency, high availability, multidatacenter or hybrid cloud environments
* Knowledge of modern messaging technologies and event based distributed architecture
* Strong skills in monitoring, observability and operational readiness of complex platforms
* Good understanding of database technologies and their performance and reliability characteristics
* Excellent modelling and documentation skills (UML; ERM; ArchiMate nice to have)
* Strong communication and collaboration skills in cross functional agile teams
* Fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Agile and modern ways of working
* A flat hierarchy and openness to share ideas, opinions and points of views
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Excellent office environment
* Work-life balance


**Ready to take the next step on your career journey?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 2026-03-02. If you have questions about the position, please contact Elinor Franzén, Talent Acquisition Partner, at elinor.franzen@seb.se.
   

  

 SEB Sweden has a redeployment responsibility, why this position might be covered by internal redeployment.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB here: www.sebgroup.com/techcareers
   

  

 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer
description:
**Senior AI Engineer – Stockholm (Hybrid)** 




  





 A fast‑growing digital product company is looking for a Senior AI Engineer to help shape how AI is used across the product and internal systems. The business has a strong customer base, a modern tech culture, and a track record of building simple, impactful digital experiences with a focus on quality, speed and user value.
 



  





 The engineering and product organisation is around 20 people, with a flat, collaborative culture and plenty of ownership. This role will be the first AI‑focused hire and will play a key part in exploring where AI can make a meaningful difference.
 



  





 About the role
 



 You’ll work closely with product, design and engineering to bring AI‑powered features into a large consumer-facing product. This includes automating parts of the customer journey, building internal tools, improving existing systems and shaping new ideas from concept to production.
 



  





 This is not a research role. You’ll spend most of your time designing, building and deploying real AI features that have direct impact on users and internal workflows.
 



  





 What you’ll be doing
 


* Building AI‑powered features into the product experience
* Designing systems that use LLMs and other AI technologies reliably in production
* Working across teams to turn ideas into working solutions
* Improving backend systems and contributing to the broader platform
* Exploring where AI adds the most value without unnecessary complexity
* Owning projects from concept through to delivery



  





 You’ll work with a modern engineering setup that includes:
 


* Kotlin with Spring Boot on the backend
* Next.js and Vercel for web
* Native mobile apps in Swift and Kotlin
* GraphQL
* Microservice architecture
* AWS as the primary cloud platform, with some use of GCP



  





 You don’t need to know every technology listed, but strong engineering fundamentals are essential.
 



  





 What makes you a great fit
 


* 4+ years of professional software engineering experience
* Strong computer science fundamentals and good judgment in system design
* Hands‑on experience building AI or LLM‑driven features in a real product
* Comfortable working with ambiguity and shaping early ideas
* Able to collaborate well with product, design and engineering teams
* Motivated by solving real customer problems and shipping useful features
* Curious, pragmatic and eager to keep learning



  





 What’s offered
 


* 30 days vacation
* ITP1 pension
* 4,000 SEK wellness allowance
* Mac and phone of your choice
* Learning and development budget
* Hybrid work model (typically 2–3 days a week in the Stockholm office)
* A friendly, flat, fast-moving tech environment with plenty of ownership



  





 This is an opportunity to be the key AI-focused engineer in a modern, product-driven company and help shape how AI is integrated into a widely used consumer experience.

title: Linux Desktop & Devices Support Engineer
description:
Canonical is a leading provider of open source software and operating systems to the global enterprise and technology markets. Our platform, Ubuntu, is very widely used in breakthrough enterprise initiatives such as public cloud, data science, AI, engineering innovation and IoT. Our customers include the world's leading public cloud and silicon providers, and industry leaders in many sectors. The company is a pioneer of global distributed collaboration, with 1100+ colleagues in 75+ countries and very few office based roles. Teams meet two to four times yearly in person, in interesting locations around the world, to align on strategy and execution.
   

  

 The company is founder led, profitable and growing.
   

  

 This is an opportunity for an Linux Engineer/Administrator with a passion for Linux and Customer Success to build a career with Canonical and support the technical needs of customers leveraging Ubuntu and open source products. If you have a passion for technology and an eagerness to learn, then you will enjoy working with some of the best people in the industry at Canonical.
   

  

 You will be accountable for delivering an outstanding technical support experience on the full Desktop and Server technical stack at Canonical. From problem qualification to full resolution, you will own and manage your cases. When needed, you will transfer your cases to your colleagues or involve senior engineers.
   

  

 Your day to day job is to provide technical expertise, be an excellent communicator and a service-oriented professional. Every day you will have to make judgement calls to prioritise customer issues and maximise your effectiveness. You will also need to set time aside to learn about our new products and technologies and evolve as a professional. You will participate in various training sessions, team gatherings and Company events.
   

  

**Location:** 
 This is a globally remote role, unless specified otherwise.
   

  

**The role entails**
* Investigate issues reported by customers by researching and escalating issues
* Work to resolve complex customer problems related to Canonical's portfolio of products.
* Ownership of results: Ensure that each support case owned by you is handled according to our Service Level Agreement (SLA) with the highest possible customer satisfaction by setting the right expectations and fulfilling your commitments.
* Engage directly with customers and work collaboratively by phone, ticketing system, and remote sessions to resolve their issues.
* Participate in a regular weekend working rotation.
* Contribute new knowledge base articles and maintain existing articles, ensuring shared knowledge and lessons learned are available to customers.
* Understanding Ubuntu development process to be able to set customer expectations correctly on timeline for a fix.


**What are we looking for in you** 
  

  

* Professional written and spoken English with excellent presentation skills
* Exceptional academic track record from both high school and university
* Undergraduate degree in a technical subject or a compelling narrative about your alternative chosen path
* Track record of going above-and-beyond expectations to achieve outstanding results
* Experience with Linux troubleshooting (collecting logs and stack traces, fine-tuning by editing configuration files)
* Experience with Linux integration with other environments (authentication/directory services, network file systems, etc.)
* Troubleshooting experience:
+ Linux integration with other environments (authentication/directory services, network file systems, etc.).
+ Ability to navigate effectively stack traces and logs, and advise on next steps.
+ Solid understanding of OS and Application level bugs and when to escalate to the correct team.

* Ability to learn quickly, thrive on change and handle the pressure of a customer facing job
* Programming fundamentals in any language.
* Ability to travel internationally twice a year for company events up to two weeks long
* Extensive Customer support experience is key:
+ Customer needs are top priority.
+ Communicate professionally, emphatically, clearly and set the right expectations.


**What we offer colleagues**
 We consider geographical location, experience, and performance in shaping compensation worldwide. We revisit compensation annually (and more often for graduates and associates) to ensure we recognise outstanding performance. In addition to base pay, we offer a performance-driven annual bonus or commission. We provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. We balance our programs to meet local needs and ensure fairness globally.
   

  

* Distributed work environment with twice-yearly team sprints in person
* Personal learning and development budget of USD 2,000 per year
* Annual compensation review
* Recognition rewards
* Annual holiday leave
* Maternity and paternity leave
* Employee Assistance Programme
* Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues
* Priority Pass, and travel upgrades for long haul company events


**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world of software. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do. Most colleagues at Canonical have worked from home since its inception in 2004. Working here is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Presales Team Lead
description:
**Role:** 
 Presales Lead – SAP Solutions (S/4HANA & Manufacturing Focus)
 



**Experience (Years):** 
 15+ years
 



**Language requirement:** 
 Swedish & English
 



  





**Tata consultancy Services** 
 is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role Overview** 




  





 We are seeking a dynamic Presales Lead with 15+ years of experience to drive presales and solutioning activities for SAP-focused engagements, with a particular emphasis on S/4HANA business solutioning in the Manufacturing domain. The ideal candidate will independently manage RFP/RFI responses, craft compelling proposals, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-value SAP solutions that address client business needs.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





**SAP S/4HANA Solutioning & Presales** 




  




* Lead the creation of business-focused SAP S/4HANA solutions tailored to client requirements, especially for Manufacturing industry clients.
* Respond to RFPs/RFIs with value-driven proposals, focusing on SAP S/4HANA transformation programs, assessments, and cloud solutions.
* Articulate business value and competitive differentiation of SAP S/4HANA solutions, especially in early sales cycle stages.
* Support acquisition of new customer logos and contribute to overall portfolio growth strategy.



  





  





**Manufacturing Domain Expertise** 




  




* Demonstrate deep understanding of manufacturing business processes, industry trends, and challenges.
* Position SAP S/4HANA as a strategic enabler for digital transformation in manufacturing, including automation, supply chain optimization, and production planning.



  





**Functional SAP S/4HANA Modules (Expertise in at least a few of these areas)** 




  




* SAP S/4HANA Finance (FI/CO)
* SAP S/4HANA Sales & Distribution (SD)
* SAP S/4HANA Materials Management (MM)
* SAP S/4HANA Production Planning (PP)
* SAP S/4HANA Plant Maintenance (PM)
* SAP S/4HANA Quality Management (QM)
* SAP S/4HANA Supply Chain (SCM)
* SAP S/4HANA Manufacturing (Discrete & Process)
* SAP S/4HANA Procurement
* SAP S/4HANA Analytics & Reporting



  





**Bid Management** 




  




* Own the end-to-end bid process, including RFP/RFI analysis, response strategy, proposal writing, pricing coordination, and submission timelines.
* Ensure compliance with internal bid governance processes and client requirements.



  





**Stakeholder Coordination** 




  




* Collaborate with sales, delivery, finance, and legal teams to gather inputs and finalize proposals.
* Engage with clients through discussions, presentations, and workshops to support sales and solutioning efforts.



  





**Knowledge Management** 




  




* Maintain a repository of reusable assets, case studies, and templates to accelerate future bids.



  





**Governance & Delivery Support** 




  




* Ensure high levels of customer satisfaction across SAP programs and engagements.
* Provide updates to client senior management and participate in steering committees as needed.



  





**Required Qualifications & Experience** 




  




* Bachelor’s degree in engineering, Business, Computer Science, or related field; MBA preferred.
* 10+ years of experience in presales, solutioning, or bid management roles, with a strong focus on SAP solutions (especially S/4HANA).
* Proven track record of independently managing large and complex RFP/RFI responses for SAP projects.
* Strong understanding of SAP business processes, digital transformation, and cloud/infrastructure domains.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Proficiency in tools like MS Office, SharePoint, and bid management platforms.



  





**Preferred Attributes** 




  




* Experience working with global clients in sectors such as Manufacturing, Telecom, BFSI, or Retail.
* Exposure to AI-led platforms, automation, and hybrid cloud solutions.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple bids simultaneously.
* Willingness to travel for client workshops or solution presentations.
* Experience in global delivery models and multicultural environments.



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com** 




  





**Privacy Note: https://ibegin.tcs.com/iBegin/privacy-notice**

title: Integrationutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 12-01-2026
   

  

* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom API-utveckling
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Azure Integration Services
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom.NET, .NET Core, C#
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Azure PaaS-tjänster
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom SQL Databaser
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Dokumentdatabaser
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Enhetstester
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Agil utveckling
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom Azure DevOps
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom CI/CD
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet inom IAC (Infrastructure as code)
* God kunskap i svenska, både tal och skrift


**Om Oss**
 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.
   

  

 Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Security Engineer
description:
*Vi tror att framsteg och möjligheter skapas bäst tillsammans. Välkommen till en plats där samarbete gör skillnad.*
**Din roll**
 Som Security Engineer hos oss blir du en nyckelspelare i ett drivet, cross-funktionellt team inom Group IT. Vi befinner oss i en spännande expansionsfas där IT spelar en avgörande roll för Saabs fortsatta resa. Här får du chansen att kombinera avancerad teknik med verklig samhällsnytta i en global miljö som uppmuntrar både innovation och flexibilitet.
   

  

 I rollen som Security Engineer arbetar du nära våra olika verksamhetsområden för att säkerställa att vi möter morgondagens krav på säkerhet och funktionalitet. Vi arbetar med löpande leveranser och använder moderna virtuella lösningar för parprogrammering och distanssamarbete, vilket vi varvar med fysiska teamträffar för att stärka sammanhållningen.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter:**
* Säkra behovs- och kravuppfyllnad i nära samarbete med verksamheten.
* Hantera och utveckla tekniska gränssnitt i projekt som ligger i teknikens absoluta framkant.
* Arbeta aktivt med kontinuerlig utveckling, testning och drift (CI/CD).
* Bidra till att framtidssäkra Saabs IT-landskap genom kreativa och robusta säkerhetslösningar.


**Din profil**
 Vi söker en engagerad lagspelare som drivs av nyfikenhet och vill växa i en miljö där vi vågar tänka nytt. Du är en kommunikativ person som trivs med att samarbeta på både svenska och engelska. För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har en relevant utbildning i grunden och ett genuint intresse för DevSecOps-metodik.
   

  

**Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av:**
* Förståelse för regelverk och efterlevnad (exempelvis NIST och NATO Restricted).
* Containers och Kubernetes (inklusive YAML).
* Automation, CI/CD och Infrastructure as Code (IaC).
* Git och öppen källkod (FOSS).
* Testning och testautomation.


 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

**Vad blir du en del av**
 Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 27 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.

title: Solution Architect – Datacenter & Hybrid Cloud
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

**Vill du ta tekniskt helhetsansvar i affärskritiska upphandlingar inom datacenter och hybrid cloud?**
 Hos CGI arbetar du som Solution Architect nära affären med att designa, kostnadssätta och presentera lösningar för verksamhetskritiska kunder med höga krav på tillgänglighet, säkerhet och stabil drift.
   

  

 Om rollen
   

  

 Du har en central roll i CGI:s bid och affärsteam och ansvarar för den tekniska helheten i anbud och större kunddialoger. Arbetet omfattar arkitektur, lösningsdesign och kommersiella underlag inom datacenter och hybrid cloud, i nära samarbete med säljare, projektledare och tekniska specialister.
   

  

**Placeringsort är flexibel – exempelvis Mälardalen, Göteborgsområdet eller Skåne.**
 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Ta fram arkitektur och lösningsförslag inom datacenter och hybrid cloud
* Delta i och driva tekniska delar av upphandlingar (RFP/RFI/RFQ)
* Säkerställa teknisk helhet, risker, antaganden och beroenden
* Arbeta med estimat, kalkyler och offerter
* Presentera och försvara lösningar i dialog med kund


**Teknikområden**
 Datacenter och infrastruktur (virtualisering, storage, backup), HA/DR, hybrid cloud, publika moln (Azure, AWS, GCP) samt säkerhet och driftsäkerhet i verksamhetskritiska miljöer.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Du har flera års erfarenhet från roller som Solution Architect, teknisk presales, teknisk KAM eller motsvarande, med ansvar för lösningsframtagning i affärsnära sammanhang. Du har arbetat med upphandlingar och anbud och har en stabil teknisk grund inom datacenter och hybrida molnlösningar. Du är van att arbeta med komplexa kravbilder och att kommunicera lösningar tydligt i dialog med både kund och interna intressenter, på svenska och engelska.
   

  

**Meriterande:** 
 erfarenhet av managed services, containerplattformar/plattformsdrift samt relevant akademisk examen.
   

  

**Därför CGI**
* Affärsnära och strategisk roll med tydlig påverkan
* Arbete med komplexa och verksamhetskritiska uppdrag
* Erfaret och prestigelöst team
* Tydliga utvecklingsvägar
* Delägarskap – du blir CGI Partner


**Ansökan**
 Vi arbetar med löpande urval.
   

  

 Frågor? Kontakta Daniel Kommes, Director Consulting Delivery
   

  

 daniel.kommes@cgi.com
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Technical Project Manager - Pharma
description:
At Capgemini Engineering, the world leader in engineering services, we bring together a global team of engineers, scientists, and architects to help the world’s most innovative companies unleash their potential. From autonomous cars to life-saving robots, our digital and software technology experts think outside the box as they provide unique R&D and engineering services across all industries. Join us for a career full of opportunities. Where you can make a difference. Where no two days are the same.
   

  

**Your Role**
 We are looking for a Techical project manager for our pharmaceutical projects in Stockholm.
   

  

*In this role you will play a key role in:*
* Partnering with the Project Manager to define technical direction and deliver compliant, integrated solutions that meet business needs.
* Owning the technical plan: assess design partners, lead lean practices, and ensure timely delivery of technical outputs.
* Building and lead high-performing teams, shaping objectives to achieve project outcomes.
* Managing stakeholder relationships and adapt communication to influence and maintain alignment.
* Applying manufacturing processes and technical standards throughout project execution.


**Your Profile**
* Master’s or Bachelor’s degree in Science (or equivalent).
* 7–10 years’ experience delivering major capital projects (>USD 5 million) and leading teams of 5–20 people.
* Strong expertise in pharmaceutical manufacturing and GMP environments.
* Proven ability to implement lean principles, schedule technical deliverables, and drive on time results.
* Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills; adept at networking, influencing, and resolving conflict.


**What We Believe You Will Enjoy About Working Here**
* We recognize the significance of flexible work arrangements to provide support. Be it remote work, or flexible work hours, you will get an environment to maintain healthy work life balance.
* At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our array of career growth programs and diverse professions are crafted to support you in exploring a world of opportunities.
* We support your personal development and offer an education library with more than 250 000 (!) courses and educations and certifications.


**Application**
 As part of our recruitment process, identity verification or background checks may occasionally be conducted.
   

  

 A valid work permit for Sweden is required.
   

  

 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem.

title: Receptionist - sommaranställning
description:
*Grand Hôtel är en plats där personalen gör skillnad och tillsammans skapar vi, med passion och stolthet, minnesvärda upplevelser för våra gäster. Grand Hôtel är ett helägt dotterbolag till FAM AB och det enda hotellet i Sverige som är med i Leading Hotels of the World.*
 Vi på Grand Hôtel letar just nu efter flera receptionister som kan ta plats i vårt Front Office-team under vår mest intensiva period: sommaren. Vi söker främst efter personer som kan arbeta extra under våren för att sedan arbeta 100% under perioden 1:a juni till 31:a augusti. För rätt person kommer det finnas mycket goda möjligheter att fortsätta arbeta extra efter säsongens slut.
   

  

**OM ROLLEN**
 Att vara receptionist hos oss innebär att varje dag är en unik upplevelse där du är den centrala personen på våra gästers resa
   

  

 Som receptionist är in- och utcheckning en del av dina uppgifter, men du spelar också huvudrollen i att skapa en gästupplevelse utöver det vanliga. Du kommer att vara den som ger ett varmt och personligt välkomnande, svarar på frågor, löser problem och skapar minnesvärda ögonblick för våra gäster. I denna dynamiska miljö är högt tempo en del av vardagen, och din förmåga att erbjuda en personlig och omsorgsfull service sträcker sig långt bortom traditionella receptionsuppgifter.
   

  

**VEM ÄR DU?**
 Vi värdesätter personliga egenskaper högt och söker dig som har en genuin känsla för service. Dina egenskaper inkluderar ansvarsfullhet, noggrannhet och förmågan att trivas i en ibland hektisk arbetsmiljö. Du måste vara flexibel och kunna anpassa dig till föränderliga situationer samt vara en problemlösare som trivs i ett snabbt tempo.
   

  

* Erfarenhet: Minst 1 års tidigare erfarenhet som hotellreceptionist, särskilt i en internationell miljö.
* Som person är du lugn och trygg och har möjlighet att fatta goda beslut även i stressiga situationer
* Systemkunskap: Tidigare arbete med hotellsystemet Opera Cloud är meriterande.
* Slutförd utbildning inom hotell och hospitality är meriterande


**VI ERBJUDER**
 Vi erbjuder inte bara en roll utan en möjlighet att vara en del av en exceptionell gästupplevelse där varje dag är en ny möjlighet att skapa magi!
   

  

* Anställning på 100% mellan 1:a juni - 31:a augusti, med möjlighet att arbeta extra båda innan och efter.
* En spännande utmaning och stimulerande arbete i ett Sveriges mest ikoniska hotell med över 300 anställda.
* En internationell arbetsplats med en levande kultur och stor mångfald bland både kollegor och gäster
* Arbetsplatsen är placerad på hotellet där vi har högt i tak och en stor variation i arbetsuppgifter
* Lön enligt kollektivavtal (HRF)
* Tillträde enligt överenskommelse


 Som en del av processen utför vi bakgrundskontroller.
   

  

 Vi motser din ansökan senast den 10/3, urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsterna kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag.

title: IT-arkitekt
description:
**Bakgrund och uppdragets art:**
 Digg har behov av att förstärka vår utveckling inom kundanslutningar och ersättningslösningar för externa aktörer med en lösningsarkitekt som kan styra och leda utvecklare.
   

  

 Vi deltar aktivt i att ta fram lösningar för offentlig sektor, både genom att ta fram specifikationer och krav men även utveckla egna tjänster. För detta uppdrag är fokus på att integrera med olika administrativa system för t.ex. ärendehantering, ekonomisystem och webbforumlär, blandat med egenutveckling för integrationer och affärslogik. De administrativa stödsystemen som avses ovan är t.ex. Atlassians Jira, iipax Ärendehantering, Sitevision och ett ekonomisystem hos Statens Servicecenter. Den egenutvecklade affärslogiken realiseras i Java och Jira. Vår tekniska målmiljö är ett antal Red Hat Linux VM:ar, kubernetes-kluster från Red Hat (Openshift) där vi idag driftar egna tjänster, utvecklingsmiljöer och vår CI/CD-pipelines.
   

  

 Vi utvecklar mikrotjänster i Java, Quarkus samt använder Vue för frontendutveckling med typescript. Vi har även utveckling i Spring och Spring Boot.
   

  

**Kompetensnivå 3.**
 Kunskap – hög kompetens inom aktuell roll
   

  

 Erfarenhet – arbetat 4–8 år inom aktuell roll, är förebild för andra Konsulter på lägre nivå
   

  

 Ledning – tar ansvar för delområde, kan leda en mindre grupp
   

  

 Självständighet – kan arbeta självständigt
   

  

**Skakrav:**
 Konsulten ska uppfylla följande:
   

  

* Ha erfarenhet av lösningsarkitekturer innehållande integrationer mellan administrativa stödsystem
* Ha erfarenhet av att ta fram lösningsarkitekturer i blandad miljö (egenutvecklat och integrationer mot administrativa system)
* Ha erfarenhet av att arbeta med kravhantering på systemnivå
* Ha erfarenhet av att ha arbetat med utvecklare i den typ av miljö som omnämns i beskrivningen av uppdraget
* Tala och skriva svenska och engelska obehindrat


 Konsulten ska lämna minst ett referensuppdrag – se bilaga ”Referensuppdrag”
   

  

**Meriterande:**
 Konsulten bör uppfylla nedanstående krav:
   

  

* Ha erfarenhet att arbeta med lösningar där Quarkus ingår
* Ha erfarenhet av att arbeta med lösningar där Java ingår
* Ha erfarenhet av lösningar där iiPax Ärendehantering ingår
* Ha erfarenhet av lösningar där Atlassian Jira ingår
* Ha erfarenhet av lösningar som integrerar med Navet och Bolagsverket för inhämtning av person och företagsuppgifter

title: Data Engineer for Ventures and New Business
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Ventures and New Business at Scania have a key role in contributing to this vision. We drive the industry transformation: At Ventures and New Business we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

 Role Summary
   

  

 A Venture Data Engineer is a critical player in new business ventures, responsible for designing and maintaining scalable data infrastructure that supports data-driven strategic decision-making and innovation. This role involves building and operating robust data pipelines, ensuring data quality, and collaborating closely with other teams to solve business problems
   

  

 Job Responsibilities
   

  

  

* Data Pipeline Engineering: Design, build, and operate scalable data pipelines to ensure high-quality data for analysis and machine learning.
* Cloud & Data Solutions: Utilize cloud-native tools for automated, scalable, and reliable data solutions aligned with best practices in data governance.
* Cross-functional Collaboration: Partner with data scientists, product managers, and engineers to create data solutions integrated into our products.
* Innovation & Improvement: Stay current with industry trends, contributing to our data strategy and continuously enhancing data engineering practices.


 Who You Are
   

  

 You’re a resourceful and driven data engineer who brings a blend of technical expertise and curiosity to solving data challenges. Skilled in cloud technologies and data pipelines, you enjoy creating scalable solutions that directly impact the business. As part of a small, agile team, you’re comfortable stepping outside your core role to tackle diverse tasks and support the team’s goals. Collaborative and adaptable, you work well with cross-functional teams, translating complex needs into practical data solutions. With a strong focus on continuous
   

  

 learning, you stay up-to-date with industry advancements and bring a creative approach to your work.
   

  

  

* Have 5+ years of experience in data engineering, focusing on cloud-native, DevOps-based data infrastructure and production-ready solutions.
* Are proficient in Python, SQL, cloud technologies (especially AWS), data pipeline architecture, and data modeling tools like DBT.
* Bring hands-on experience with scalable data pipelines, ETL/ELT processes, and CI/CD practices to ensure high-quality, robust, and reliable data flows for large datasets.
* Are analytical, solution-oriented, and motivated to tackle complex data challenges in a collaborative setting.
* Have a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.


 This Is Us
   

  

 Everyone working at Scania is united by a common purpose: Driving the shift towards a sustainable transport system. We know that the transport industry must change, and it’s a change we want to lead. At Ventures and New business, we develop complementing solutions to our core and build new growth through ventures and investments that can accelerate us in driving the shift.
   

  

 People are core to our business. By joining our journey towards a sustainable transport system, you are contributing to the future of transport. You are part of a team that can create real change. At Ventures and New Business, we want to engage and inspire our full organization to create results together with us. Collaboration and entrepreneurial spirit is part of our culture and what makes us successful. By joining us you will be a part of driving meaningful growth in new ways!
   

  

 Scania Offers
   

  

 We offer you the chance to be part of an organization that is focused on reaching Scania’s targets and to truly drive the industry transformation. People who work here have the motivation and desire to constantly make things better.
   

  

 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options. Our office is located in central Stockholm at Drottninggatan. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally. Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families.
   

  

 Application
   

  

 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2026-02-10. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact: Linda Rosenqvist at, linda.rosenqvist@scania.com
   

  

**We look forward to your application!**

title: Partner Sales Manager - Nordics
description:
Graphisoft® empowers teams to design great buildings through award-winning software solutions, learning programs, and professional services for the AEC industry. Our award-winning products and solutions support OPEN BIM for workflow transparency, longevity, and data accessibility for built assets.
 **Archicad®** 
 , the architects’ BIM software of choice, offers a complete end-to-end design and documentation workflow for architectural and integrated architectural and engineering practices of any size.
 **BIMx®** 
 , the most popular mobile and web BIM app, extends the BIM experience to include all stakeholders in the building design, delivery, and operations lifecycle.
 **BIMcloud®** 
 , the AEC industry’s first and most advanced cloud-based team collaboration solution, makes real-time collaboration possible across the globe regardless of the size of the project and the speed or quality of the team members’ network connection.
 **DDScad** 
 solutions support users with intelligent Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing (MEP) design tools, integrated calculations, and comprehensive documentation of all building system disciplines. Graphisoft is part of the Nemetschek Group. To learn more, visit more visit www.graphisoft.com
   

  

 The Partner Sales Manager will be responsible for managing and developing our channel partners in the Nordics region. This role requires a strong background and proven experience in channel sales. The individual will drive day-to-day partner engagement at multiple levels, ensuring strong alignment on business objectives and delivering sustained revenue growth. Key responsibilities include forecasting, quarterly business reviews (QBRs), annual planning, and joint selling into strategic large accounts.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Manage and develop our channel partners in the Nordic region, ensuring delivery of agreed revenue and growth targets.
* Lead day-to-day business engagement across operational, tactical, and strategic levels within the partner organisation.
* Drive co-selling activities with the partner into high-value strategic accounts.
* Conduct quarterly business reviews (QBRs) to assess performance, address challenges, and identify new growth opportunities.
* Develop and execute annual joint business plans with the partner, ensuring alignment on goals, initiatives, and investments.
* Deliver accurate and timely forecasts, ensuring pipeline integrity and visibility.
* Act as the primary point of escalation for the partner and resolve complex business or operational issues.
* Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to inform partner strategy and positioning.
* Collaborate with internal teams (Sales, Marketing, Technical Support, Customer Success) to maximise partner performance and customer satisfaction.
* Represent the partner’s voice within the company, providing actionable insights to influence product development and go-to-market strategies.


**Requirements**
* Bachelor’s degree in business, architecture, engineering, or related field; advanced degree preferred.
* 5+ years of experience in channel partner sales, strategic account management, or business development, preferably within the AEC software/SaaS industry.
* Proven track record managing high-value strategic partners and delivering sustained revenue growth.
* Preferably strong knowledge of the AEC market, including CAD/BIM solutions, workflows, and ecosystem partners.
* Exceptional relationship management, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
* Strategic thinker with strong business acumen and commercial awareness.
* Comfortable engaging at C-level as well as operational levels within partner and customer organisations.
* Highly organised, self-motivated, and able to operate effectively in a fast-paced, matrix environment.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English; proficiency in a Nordic language is an advantage.

title: Major Account Manager Sweden
description:
Why Join Us?
   

  

 Welcome to an exciting opportunity at Check Point!
   

  

 We are actively seeking a high-energy
 **Major Account Manager – Hunter & Farmer** 
 to fuel Check Point’s next phase of growth. This role is critical to our FY26 strategy, focused on winning new strategic logos and opening high-value enterprise relationships where Check Point does not yet have a footprint.
   

  

 As a pure new business role, you will lead the charge in identifying, engaging, and breaking into untapped strategic accounts. If you thrive on proactive hunting, executive-level engagement, and turning cold opportunities into long-term customers, this role offers the chance to make a visible and lasting impact in the cybersecurity industry.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* 
+ Proactively hunt and win new strategic logos, opening high-value enterprise relationships to drive net-new revenue growth.
+ Apply structured and disciplined prospecting methodologies to identify, qualify, and prioritize new target accounts.
+ Secure and lead initial executive-level meetings, demonstrating strong presence, credibility, and value articulation.
+ Navigate and overcome entry barriers through strategic thinking, persistence, and resilience.
+ Own early-stage deal progression with clear potential to develop into a consistent closer of new business opportunities.


**Qualifications**
* 
+ Proven hunter mindset with a strong drive for net-new logo acquisition and enterprise account penetration.
+ +7 years of demonstrated experience using structured prospecting and qualification approaches in complex sales environments.
+ Executive presence and confidence engaging senior stakeholders and decision-makers.
+ Strategic, resilient, and proactive profile with the ability to overcome resistance and ambiguity.
+ Clear potential and ambition to grow into a consistent closer in high-value new business pursuits.


**Why Check Point?**
 At Check Point, you’ll work with cutting edge cybersecurity technologies, a global partner ecosystem, and talented professionals who are passionate about making a difference. We offer opportunities for growth, ownership, and real impact while helping organizations worldwide stay secure in an ever-evolving digital landscape.

title: Solution Architect Digital Workplace
description:
**Beskrivning av tjänsten** 




 Vill du designa framtidens digitala arbetsplatser i affärskritiska kunduppdrag?
 



 CGI söker nu en erfaren Solution Architect / Lösningsarkitekt inom Digital Arbetsplats som vill arbeta affärsnära i bid- och upphandlingsteam. Rollen har ett tydligt fokus på att designa, paketera och kostnadssätta lösningar samt ta en ledande roll i upphandlingar och offertarbete kopplat till moderna digitala arbetsplatser.
 



 Du blir en nyckelspelare i våra affärsprojekt där du tillsammans med kundteam, leveransorganisation och specialister skapar konkurrenskraftiga lösningsförslag som möter kundernas krav på säkerhet, användarupplevelse, produktivitet och kostnadseffektivitet.
 



 Vi är öppna för flera placeringsorter, exempelvis Mälardalen, Göteborgsområdet eller Skåne.
 



  





**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som Solution Architect inom Digital Arbetsplats hos CGI arbetar du huvudsakligen i bidteam och affärsprojekt, ofta kopplade till upphandlingar (RFP/RFI/RFQ). Ditt ansvar är att omsätta kundernas verksamhetsbehov och kravbilder till tydliga, hållbara och kommersiellt attraktiva lösningar.
 



 Rollen kräver en kombination av djup teknisk kompetens, affärsförståelse och förmåga att kommunicera lösningar på ett pedagogiskt sätt – både skriftligt i anbud och muntligt i dialog med kund.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden** 



* Design och arkitektur av lösningar inom Digital Arbetsplats
* Skapa och kvalitetssäkra lösningsbeskrivningar, kalkyler och offerter
* Aktiv medverkan i upphandlingar och anbudsarbete
* Ansvara för teknisk helhet, antaganden, risker och beroenden i lösningsförslag
* Samarbeta tätt med kundteam, projektledare och tekniska specialister
* Presentera och försvara lösningar inför kund
* Bidra till utveckling av CGI:s erbjudanden, standardlösningar och metoder



  





**Teknik- och fokusområden** 



* Microsoft 365 (Teams, SharePoint, Exchange, Intune, Entra ID)
* Säker digital arbetsplats (Identity, Device & Information Protection)
* Endpoint management och modern klienthantering
* DEX (Digital Employee Experience)
* AI-stöd i den digitala arbetsplatsen (t.ex. Copilot)
* Molnbaserade och hybrida lösningar



  





  





**För att lyckas i rollen ser vi att du har** 



* Minst 5 års erfarenhet i roller såsom Solution Architect, teknisk presales, teknisk KAM eller liknande inom Digital Arbetsplats
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av upphandlingar och offertarbete
* Djup teknisk kompetens inom Microsofts ekosystem för modern arbetsplats
* Förmåga att ta fram strukturerade, tydliga och affärsmässiga lösningsförslag
* Mycket god kommunikationsförmåga i svenska och engelska
* Ett strukturerat arbetssätt och vana att hantera flera parallella affärsspår



  





**Meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet av större outsourcing- eller managed services-affärer
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetsarkitektur kopplat till digital arbetsplats
* Akademisk examen inom IT, teknik eller ekonomi



  





**Därför ska du välja CGI** 



* Affärsnära och strategisk roll med stor påverkan på kundaffärer
* Möjlighet att arbeta med stora, komplexa och samhällsviktiga kunder
* Ett erfaret och samarbetsorienterat team med hög teknisk nivå
* Tydliga karriärvägar och kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling
* Aktiv satsning på AI, DEX och framtidens arbetsplatslösningar
* Delägarskap – hos oss är du CGI Partner, inte bara anställd



  





**Ansökan** 




 Låter detta som nästa steg i din karriär? Skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt – vi arbetar med löpande urval.
 



 Inför anställning genomför vi UC-kontroll samt begär utdrag ur belastningsregistret.
 



 Har du frågor om rollen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta: Daniel Kommes, Director Consulting Delivery, daniel.kommes@cgi.com
 



  





**Som anställd erbjuds du nedan förmåner:** 



* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4 000 kr.
* Trygg anställning: Våra medlemmar anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.

title: SAP Program Director
description:
**Role:** 
 SAP Program Director
 



**Experience (Years):** 
 17+ Years
 



**Language requirement:** 
 Swedish & English
 



  





**Tata consultancy Services** 
 is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Must-Have:** 




  





**1) Program Leadership:** 




  




* Lead and oversee SAP conversion program and optimization projects, ensuring they align with overall business objectives and deliver value to the organization.
* Establish and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders across the business to secure their involvement and commitment throughout the project.



  





**2) Business Alignment:** 




  




* Ensure that the program’s goals are closely aligned with the company’s strategic business objectives.
* Work closely with senior executives and business leaders to understand their needs and ensure these are reflected in the SAP implementation.



  





**3) Communication Strategy:** 




  




* Develop and execute comprehensive communication plans to keep all stakeholders informed and engaged.
* Ensure that project updates, milestones, and changes are effectively communicated across the organization.



  





**4) Project Management:** 




  




* Oversee the day-to-day management of the SAP program, ensuring that projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget.
* Identify, manage, and mitigate project risks and issues to ensure successful project outcomes.



  





**5) Performance Monitoring:** 




  




* Track and report on program performance, providing regular updates to senior management.
* Ensure that all deliverables meet the required quality standards and business requirements.



  





**Experience required:** 




  




* Proven experience as a Senior Program Director or Senior Project Director, with a strong track record of leading large-scale SAP implementation and optimization projects.
* Experience in aligning complex IT projects with business objectives in a global or multinational company.



  





**Skills:** 




  




* Excellent English language skills, both written and spoken.
* Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage and influence stakeholders at all levels.
* Expertise in developing and executing communication strategies for large projects.
* Deep understanding of SAP systems and their implementation in large organizations.



  





**Technical Skills:** 




  




* Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies.
* Strong understanding of SAP software, particularly in implementation and optimization contexts.



  





**Good to have:** 




  




* Strong SAP S/4 implementation Experience
* Knowledge in Retail business



  





**Responsibility of / Expectations from the Role** 




  




* Proven experience as a Senior Program Director or Senior Project Director, with a strong track record of leading
* Experience in aligning complex IT projects with business objectives in a global or multinational company
* Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies
* Deep understanding of SAP systems and their implementation in large organizations
* Should be focused in on-time delivery



  





**Does that sound interesting?** 




  





 You are welcome to submit your application consisting of your CV, personal letter, relevant degrees or certifications details, professional references, etc. We work with ongoing recruitment so send in your application as soon as possible.
 



  





 We look forward to receiving your application via LinkedIn or mail to
 **aswini.ranganathan@tcs.com**

title: Senior/Lead AWS Engineer with TypeScript
description:
We are seeking a
 **Senior / Lead AWS engineer Consultant** 
 with strong expertise in
 **Global Edge infrastructure** 
 to support the evolution and scaling of a large, business-critical public web platform. The assignment focuses on designing, securing, and standardizing edge-based infrastructure to ensure high performance, scalability, and robust cyber security on a global scale.
   

  

 The consultant will play a key role in shaping and improving the organization’s public infrastructure, which serves
 **millions of users worldwide** 
 and operates under high availability and security requirements.
   

  

**Start: Preferably asap**
**Duration: 6 months, with high probability of extension**
**Location: Stockholm, min 3 days/week onsite required**
**About the assignment:**
* Design, evolve, and standardize Global Edge infrastructure
* Strengthen security posture using WAF and edge-based protection mechanisms
* Implement and maintain infrastructure using AWS CDK in TypeScript
* Support scalability and performance improvements for a global user base
* Act as a senior technical advisor within the public infrastructure domain


**Your profile**
* AWS CloudFront – design, configuration, optimization, and operation
* AWS Web Application Firewall (WAF) – security rules, protection strategies, and monitoring
* AWS Cloud Development Kit (CDK) – infrastructure as code, preferably in TypeScript
* TypeScript – used both for infrastructure and supporting services
* Proven experience working with large-scale, high-traffic commercial websites or platforms
* Strong understanding of edge-based architectures and their role in performance, scalability, and security
* Experience operating in environments where availability, latency, and cyber security are critical
* Ability to contribute at both architectural and hands-on implementation level
* Comfortable working in cross-functional teams with platform, security, and development stakeholders

title: Assistent till enheten CTO-office och Investments & Partnerships
description:
Vill du arbeta nära innovation, strategi och framtida tillväxt i ett av Sveriges främsta industriföretag inom försvarsindustrin?
   

  

 På Saab arbetar vi med allt från ny teknik till nya arbetssätt, samarbeten och affärsmodeller som stärker vår långsiktiga konkurrenskraft och samhällsnytta. Nu söker vi en engagerad och strukturerad assistent till enheterna CTO-office och Investments & Partnerships.
   

  

 Din roll
   

  

 Rollen är placerad inom Group Strategy & Technology och stöttar CTO-office samt Investments & Partnerships, som ansvarar för bland annat M&A, Ventures och strategiska partnerskap.
   

  

 Du fungerar som ett nav i verksamheten och bidrar till att skapa struktur, tempo, kvalitet och framdrift i ett arbete som spänner från strategiska prioriteringar till operativt genomförande. Genom god planering, förberedelse och uppföljning möjliggör du att idéer kan omsättas i handling.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:
   

  

* Ge kvalificerat administrativt och operativt stöd, inklusive kalenderhantering, möteskoordinering, reseadministration, avtalshantering samt förberedelse av underlag till ledningsfunktioner.
* Stötta strategi- och innovationsrelaterade initiativ genom att koordinera möten, workshops och samarbeten över organisationsgränser.
* Ta fram presentationsmaterial och beslutsunderlag, främst i PowerPoint, för lednings- och beslutsforum.
* Ansvara för eventkoordinering – från idé till genomförande.
* Hantera ekonomisk administration såsom fakturahantering, konsultbeställningar och förlängningar samt tidrapportering.
* Samverka professionellt och proaktivt med interna och externa kontakter.


 Tjänsten är placerad på Saabs huvudkontor i Stockholm.
   

  

 Din profil
   

  

 Du är nyfiken, strukturerad och trygg i att arbeta nära seniora ledare i en föränderlig och framåtblickande miljö. Du trivs i sammanhang som präglas av utveckling, innovation, skiftande tempo och förändring, där struktur, förberedelse och uppföljning är avgörande för framgång.
   

  

 Här driver och leder du arbetet genom att visa på ansvar och gott omdöme. Du har ett professionellt och samarbetsinriktat förhållningssätt och motiveras av att bidra till långsiktigt värdeskapande.
   

  

 Du hanterar känslig information med integritet och är bekväm med viss grad av snabba omprioriteringar.
   

  

 Kravprofil
   

  

* Erfarenhet av arbete som assistent, executive assistant eller inom business support i en strategisk eller komplex organisation.
* Mycket god förmåga att planera, koordinera och ta fram strukturerat material och presentationer.
* Erfarenhet av ekonomisk administration eller kostnadshantering; erfarenhet av Agresso eller liknande system är meriterande.
* Goda kunskaper i Office365
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och söker dig som har rätt inställning, nyfikenhet och ansvarskänsla för att lyckas i rollen.
   

  

 Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.
   

  

 Vad du blir en del av
   

  

 Upptäck oändliga möjligheter. Anta utmaningar, skapa smarta innovationer och uppgradera dina förmågor. Det här är en plats för kluriga tänkare, modiga pionjärer och alla däremellan. Tillsammans uppnår vi det extraordinära, var och en tar med sitt unika perspektiv. Varje bidrag räknas.
   

  

 Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 26,100 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.
   

  

 Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här.

title: Allocation Management & Replenishment Lead
description:
Tata consultancy Services is an IT services, consulting and business solutions organization that has been partnering with many of the world’s largest businesses for the past 50 years. We believe innovation and collective knowledge can transform all our futures with greater purpose. We help companies across industries achieve their strategic goals and lead their digital transformation programs. With 600,000 experts globally and 18,000+ consultants working for leading Nordic Customers, we have a strong sense of purpose for the ecosystem around us – our employees, partners, customers and society.
 



  





**Role: Allocation Management & Replenishment Lead** 




**Experience (Years): 15+ Years** 




  





**Must-Have:** 




  




* Business Process Lead with Strong process knowledge and experience in planning & conducting process workshops and do FIT/GAP analysis in allocation management & Replenishment process for Fashion
* Minimum of 12+ years of experience in SAP Retail – Allocation & Replenishment processes (SAP UDF, SAP Allocation management – Push and Pull)
* SAP AMR implementation experience is must
* SAP UDF process knowledge and replenishment process knowledge is required

title: Embedded Security Engineer (TPM & Cryptography)
description:
**Startdatum:** 
 ASAP
   

  

**Slutdatum:** 
 Option på förlängning
   

  

**Omfattning:** 
 100 %
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Stockholm, Hybrid
   

  

**Uppdragsbeskrivning**
 För en större internationell aktör söker vi en specialist inom inbyggd säkerhet med fokus på hårdvarunära skyddsmekanismer och säker hantering av kryptografiska tillgångar. Uppdraget innebär att stärka säkerhetsarkitekturen i uppkopplade produkter och säkerställa att dessa uppfyller aktuella regulatoriska krav inom cybersäkerhet på EU-nivå.
   

  

 Rollen är starkt teknisk och kräver god förståelse för både hårdvara och mjukvara, där du bidrar till att bygga tillförlitliga lösningar för identitet, nyckelhantering och säker uppstart av enheter.
   

  

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**
* Implementera och konfigurera hårdvarubaserade säkerhetslösningar i embedded-system
* Arbeta med säker lagring och livscykelhantering av kryptografiska nycklar
* Skydda känslig information såsom certifikat, autentiseringsuppgifter och hemligheter
* Designa och implementera secure boot, device identity och trust chains
* Stödja utvecklingsteam i att möta regulatoriska cybersäkerhetskrav
* Samarbeta nära hårdvaru- och mjukvaruteam kring säkerhetsfrågor


**Skall-krav**
* Minst 10 års erfarenhet inom embedded-utveckling eller inbyggd säkerhet
* Praktisk erfarenhet av TPM, Secure Elements eller motsvarande säkerhetskomponenter
* Mycket goda kunskaper i C och/eller C++
* Erfarenhet av kryptografi i praktiken, inklusive PKI och certifikathantering
* God förståelse för säkerhetsarkitektur i ARM-baserade system


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av secure boot och enhetssäkerhet
* Tidigare arbete med regulatoriska krav inom cybersäkerhet
* Erfarenhet av produktutveckling för uppkopplade och säkerhetskritiska system

title: Senior Product Manager - API Platform
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us — and let the world feel your work.**
 We are looking for a
 **Senior Product Manager** 
 for our Growth Product Area. This role is located at our HQ in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 This is an exciting opportunity to lead our publicly facing API platform, powering developers, partners to build scalable integrations and experiences. This role owns the vision, strategy, and execution of APIs that are critical to our product ecosystem and business growth.
   

  

 You’ll be a key part of our Growth Product department, whose mission is to attract and retain enterprises, businesses and professional creators that are soundtracking content globally.
   

  

 You’ll report to the SVP of product in Growth and get to work with a super talented group of engineering, design, finance, marketing and commercial colleagues to drive change. This is a hands-on role, where you can make a significant impact.
   

  

**Your Key Responsibilities Include**
* Form and grow a vision, strategy for the public API team that helps serve our customers and business goals.
* Build strong relationships with our external customers and business teams to ensure we have alignment to unlock the right capabilities.
* Expertly communicate with internal stakeholders to make sure we are building the right things, tracking success metrics, and communicating developments.
* Collaborate with technical peers in the daily operations to ensure delivery by also keeping an eye on capabilities, happiness, resilience, and growth to empower the team.


**Requirements**
* 5+ years of product management experience, including ownership of platforms or APIs
* Strong understanding of REST and/or GraphQL APIs, authentication, versioning, and SDKs.
* Experience shipping and operating public or partner-facing APIs
* Excellent relationship-building skills, helping your team prioritize and communicating that priority in the organization
* The ability to lead in complex and uncertain environments and thrive when you drive change and create structure


**Nice to have**
* Familiarity with API monetization models (usage-based, tiered pricing, freemium)
* Experience working with a saas and enterprise businesses models.


**Equal opportunity employer**
 We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.
   

  

**Application**
 Ready to make the world
 *feel* 
 your work? Please apply, in English.
   

  

**Thinking about joining us?** 
***Tune in***
**with our CEO - and see if we sound like your kind of vibe!**
